Ka manga fagtahinan fagalan-han-Diyos, hanggan ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo, igsayak it halimbawan no kinday ara ta no gomamat mafyaloman in Hisos hanggan wagfahatay hanya.
Maskin fag idwa hono sas Fanohodan, ngandayo manga taw mangagran wan.

Da Hisos no sawas Bitanya san Simon balay, ka Simon ka ha kitong hyabi, sadik ina naakbang in Hisos, ha diya sohadan alabastoro fag bato, napno famabanglo nardo, idwa ha aktom iba, dahol it sali. Is Hisos no sas bilog fanganan, ka ina nabolang ka sohadan, nabohos ka famabanglo han Hisos boknga alfoyo.
Dapat ha manga taw tiba sinya kahori odit manga fangayofan. Ista fangayofan iglwang, Anogon di famabanglo,
balay balay no nafasali yapman tonya, bondi tolok gatos dinaryo haraw, ginyan disag has manga myabog it sali. Ta nangabaya ka ina.
Dapat is Hisos nalwang kitay, Ham fabayaanan wa ka ina, kana ham no kabaya hanya? Kafiyaon to kat naibolon hangko.
Maskin ka manga myabog idwa ha fagalinan gi hayo akbang, nyawa ginahin ham no kasayag togbong has myabog, ham tomwa wan, dapat aho idwa fagaba maofodan hayo aban.
Ka ina naiblon kat fagsyaganon kati, nagona wa nabohos famabanglo, maskin igfatalaga angko habilogan has lobgoban aban.
Hogfwayong hayo, bonwa bohag, nyawa siday, sadik baba daga, ta no tomoltol ka Fiya fag Barita aban, ta fagaba wa aba omowas to fag ina it naibolon, yakanga tomohod hanya fagaba.
Ginyas Hodas Israkiyoti, ka sadi gis Safolo-ha-Dowa, hawas manga fagtahinan fagalan-han-Diyos kaarakitay goyon in Hisos manga kalaban.
Ka manga fagtahinan fagalan igbaya wan ta no nadog kitay is Hodas goyon is taw. Taglwang ta tomangdan ara hanya. Ginya wa ginan is Hodas gisip no ginahin no somyagan wa fagamat has taw in Hisos.

Ka sirang gona ta no kwan Tinapay Mayangfis indasog wan hanggan gis nanya yadi fag sirang tagsogba ka anak topa fangafiyan kawa hasta Yafon Fanohodan Nagsagayan. In Hisos manga katogbong naintaw hanya, kitay, Siday nangos araw hyamo fakasayaon hami nogfatalaga intam Yafon Fanohodan Nagsagayan?
Is Hisos nasogot katogbong dowa, nalwang kitay, Ham, fag hawas basad banwa. Ham homablang araw sadik ama ka ha songgoy tapayan fwalidan danom. Ham tahinan wa hanya.

Nyawa haday hanya no somakbaw, intawan hasagfon balay, fag lwang kitay, Kagfaadal has taw iglwang, Siday fag lingoban araw angko fasakbawan famaklay kaarakitay manayowan yadi, angko manga katogbong no kwan intam Yafon Fanohodan Nagsagayan?
Hanya falag ara hayo sadik lingoban dahol, matalagaan, sas tongod fag salogan. Ham fag fatalaga intam Yafon sinya.
Ginya madi in Hisos manga katogbong inlahaw wan, hawas banwa, hanggan ta nalag wa fagayo kito kan Hisos fwayong, yakanga ta sinya wak nafatalaga ista Yafon Fanohodan Nagsagayan.
Ginya madi araw, no kayabi wan, is Hisos hanggan it manga katogbong, safolo ha dowa, ta fagayo sinya wan.
Ta no sas bilog fanganan, kwan yapdi, is Hisos iglwang, Hogfwayong ha hayo, bonwa bohag, insadi sa hayo kaoyon angko kalaban, sadi kagsayo angko kati.
Ginya madi ka manga katogbong inrongkot wagdog, igsadig sadi gintaw kitay, Aho awkin kam faglwangon?
Is Hisos nasagot kitay, Sadi sas Safolo-ha-Dowa, angko kasayo kati igtogna tinapay sas basad mangkok.

Maskin aho, Kanbali Taw, kaakbang wa kalahaw kito kansorat hyabi, kawa angko dalanon, dapat ay, isyay wan, angko ofod ka goyon angko manga kalaban. Fiya man hara ha hanya, hanya nodwan sagaya git ina hyabi.
Ta no kwan yapdi, is Hisos nabol tinapay, nabaya in Diyos, nafaarogbotan, ginya nadisag has taw. Is Hisos iglwang, Toy angko habilogan, ham fag bol.
Ginya madi is Hisos nabol ka fanginoman ka ha sohad danom obas, nabaya in Diyos, ginya nafagamit is taw. Ta fagayo nainom wan.
Ginya madis Hisos nalwang has taw, Toy angko folot kagfaganit intam taranggapan. Angko folot kamwatwat kawa has fakaaywanan fag manga taw.
Hogfwayong ha hayo, bonwa bohag, hodwa ominom domwag danom obas, nodwa aban ya aho no ominom bago fag danom obas san Diyos sakop banwanan.
Ta no nangambahan sadik ambahan, tanlahaw wa a, hawas Moyod Oliboan.
Ginyas Hisos iglwang hat manga katogbong, Ham fagayo omobon wangko, maskin insorat sas Kasoratan kitay, Ho fahatay ka fangano, ginya madit anoon fag manga topa manarowayan wan.
Dapat ay aban, aho nomboyag ya domwag, aho gomona wa hayo has sakop Galiliya.
Is Pidrog lwang han Hisos kitay, Nyawa ta fagayo omobon hyamo araw, hodwa omobon hyamo.
Ginya madis Hisos nalwang han Pidro, Yatokitay, lag nga araw, araw basad yabi, bago it fadowa ginan fag kataraok tabag, tolo ginan haw tomangkod angko has taw.
Dapat is Pidro marigon wagfwayong, Nyawa ta hanggan wa fahatay intam dowa, hodwa tomangkod hyamo has taw. Ka tibak manga katogbong iglwang yadi kitonya.
Ginya madi da Hisos nalahaw wan, hawas sadik foyo, taglwang, Gitsimani. Is Hisos iglwang hat manga katogbong, Ham fag matokawan yap istay, aho nogdarangin yapdi.
Ginyas Hisos nataban inda Pidro da Santyago da Hwan. In Hisos fangayofan igfabago wagdog marongkot, galibitan wan.
Is Hisos nafwayong handa Pidro, Angko karongkotan bilang wa kodkod sangko basad fangayofan. Hogdog angko kahoriyan ho bilang wa kahatay wan. Ham fag mafanayan yapdistay, matagahan.
Is Hisos nonayayo ogbot gis taw, iglohoban wan sas baba daga, igdarangin kitay, no katwa di nangos, ka gis nanya fag mahori fag kasohodan, fag somagaya lamang hanya.

Nalwang kitay, Mama, angko Ama, idwa hagsagaya hyamo fagsyaganon. Fag bol nangos gingko to fag fanginoman kahoriyan kati. Dapat, nyawa hoglwang kitonya, fag hyamo kafangayofanan kam-anod, bohonwa angko.

Is Hisos nonfwali ya hat manga katogbong tolo, nalag kitay ta matoyogan wan. Nafwayong han Pidro, Simon, haw awkin matoyogan? Haw awkin idwa gagwanta mafolawan matagahan mangharaw, ngadi sik tama sinyahod?
Ham fag matagahan, fag darangin wan kaarakitay idwa hagfaloksowan hayo. Ka fangayofan orongan wa kasaya has fiya, dapat ka habilogan malombay.
Fadowa ginan is Hisos nasaman ya gis taw a, nandarangin, kito mandi ka haraw.
Sadi ya ginan is Hisos infwali ya hat manga ofod, ya mangharaw, ta matoyogan ya ngawan, maskin ista mata matapyaton. In Hisos manga katogbong kaya wan, idwa twag sagot hanya.

It fatolo fag swali araw is Hisos naakbang ya, ginya nalwang handa Pidro kitay, Ham awkin matoyogan yapdi, mafahowayan odi, fiya wan. Yabay, kati wan, ka yadi angko ofod ka goyon angko kalaban igfagamat angko, aho Kanbali Taw, has manga taw dwat.
Ham ha kalibang, fakabangon wan, tya wan, kangko ofod ka goyon has taw.

Sadi wa ginan, is Hisos no kampang yapdi, is Hodas, sadi gis Safolo-ha-Dowa, indasog wan. Ha taban kaaywanon fag manga taw, salawidan manga talibong, mabitbitan manga pinotol. Ka manga fagtahinan fagalan-han-Diyos, mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo, hanggan manga fagtahinan sas banwa ka nasogo tonya fag manga taw.
Ta nodyan dasog sinya, kanoyon has taw danwa nafatohoyan is taw, iglwang kitay, No sida kangko ayohon fag ama, tonya wan kantam iktanon. Gamatan wa dagos tonya. Tabanan wan.
Is Hodas nondasog wa sinya, naakbang wa dagos han Hisos, iglwang kiti, Haw kagfaadal has taw. Ginyas Hodas naayok in Hisos faringfing.
Manga taw natoklos in Hisos a, nagamat hanya.
Dapat insadi ka malindogan akbang sinya nagonos it talibong a, nabasing ka gorangon fag fagalan sogowan, natigbas it talinga.
Ginya madis Hisos nalwang has fakaaywanan fag manga taw kitay, Aho awkin tolisan, ham gayfan, maskin ham ha diya manga talibong, mabitbitan manga pinotol famogfog, kaarakitay gomamat angko?
Sirang sirang ho gofod hayo igfaadal basad Fanimbaan-Dahol, bati ham idwa gamat angko gis nanya. Dapat fag im-anod wan no kinday kansorat sas Kasoratan.
Ginya madi in Hisos manga katogbong fagayo naobon in Hisos idwam dowa, nalagyo dan.
Sadik anahan maholimpayan homot goyan yadin Hisos. Manga sondalo nagamat yadi hanya,
dapat ka anahan nalfas di, it homot odi kangoyan sasta gamat. Nalagyo idwa ha rotay.

Ka manga nagamat in Hisos nataban hanya has gorangon fag fagalan-han-Diyos. Ka manga fagtahinan fagalan fagayo, ka manga fagtahinan sas banwa hanggan ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo matifonan yadi sinya.

No kitay di, is Pidro goyan haraw in Hisos, dapat ayayo sat ginanan. Ginya, nondasog sas gorangon fag fagalan it balay, is Pidro nasakbaw has basad aladan, intokaw maofodan yadi has manga bantay sondalo, mafanayangan afoy.

Yabay, ka manga fagtahinan fagalan-han-Diyos hanggan ka tifonan manga fagtahinan Hodyo fagayo igsayak manga taw ka bomangdan in Hisos kaarakitay ta fahatay hanya. Dapat tadwa ha lagan it fagbohagon han Hisos.
Maskin ha akwag bangdan hanya, dapat idwa pariho ista fwayong.
Dapat ha akwa yadi tiba nalindog, nabangdan in Hisos, iglwang kitay,
Mi nadog to fag ama igfwayong kitay, Ho domwat to fag Fanimbaan-Dahol ista gamat nahalig. Dapat ay, sas tolo lamang ik sirang, ho fatobo ya sadi yak Fanimbaan-Dahol, bonwa gamat taw nahalig.
Dapat nyawa kitonya, ista bangdan idwa myasa kitonya.
Ginya madi ka gorangon fag fagalan-han-Diyos nalindog sasta fagbokngan, naintaw han Hisos, Haw awkin idwag sagot? Kana tonya kasta sombong kawa ha hyamo?
Dapat is Hisos idwa naawang, idwa yadi nasagot. Ka Gorangon fag fagalan naintaw ya domwag in Hisos, nalwang kitay, Haw awkin in Diyos-natogon-Famawi? Haw awkin kantam Fagbayaon, it anak?

Is Hisos iglwang, Ala, aho ngay. Aban ham lomag yadingko, aho Kanbali Taw, matokawan sat akbang, sat balis sihon, kadwa ha bosal. Ham lomag yadi wangko, kadasog aban sas baba manga linyabo gin Diyos banwanan sam tongod.
Ginya madi, ka gorangon fag fagalan-han-Diyos naragyang it sadili solong rotay, nalwang, Kana mayon tam nogsayak yapdi ista sombong tiba taw?
Ham ngap fadi wad nadog kati, gi wa ngap it sadili bibig, igsway wa orongan in Diyos. Kinday hayo fangayofan? Fagayo fagayo nafatohoyan kitay ka fiya fahatayan in Hisos.
Ginya madi ka tiba igtofay in Hisos. Tagtaklob it mata, ginyag sontok hanya, bago diglwang, Sogi, boktongan. Ginya ka manga bantay sondalo natofa yadi marigon in Hisos.
Is Pidro no sayapdista basad aladan, ka gorangon fag fagalan sogowan ina sadi inbangkad yadi sinya.
No nalag in Pidro igfanayang afoy, nabantay hanya fiya fiya, ginyag lwang, Haw mangharaw tonya fag ama it ofod yadi, kawas Hisos taga Nasarit.
Dapat is Pidro natangkod wan, iglwang wa hanya fag ina, Twa man. Hodwa twagdog im faglwangon. Is Pidro igfatawas wan, hawas bilog sakbawan alad.
Ka sogowan ina nalag ya in Pidro, nafadahit ya has manga taw ka manga malindogan sinya kitay, To fag ama in Hisos wa nga ofod.
Dapat is Pidro sadiya ginan natangkod. Ginya madi, araw araw ogbot, ka manga taw sinya, sadi ya ginan nalwang han Pidro, Yabay, haw it ofod yadi wa sadi, matohoyanan wan, haw taga Galiliya yadi.
Dapat is Pidro natangkod marigon, iglwang, Nyawa ho matay wan, orongan wan hodwa kilala tonya fag ama hayo faglwangon.

Ginya madi ka tabag dagos wa nataraok it fadowa ginan. Is Pidro bago di natohod in Hisos fwayong hanya kitay, Ka tabag nodyag taraok it fadowa ginan, tolo ginan haw tomangkod has taw angko. Ginya madis Pidro naoraw wa marigon.

Araw, no dayo kasirang, ka manga fagtahinan fagalan-han-Diyos, ka manga fagtahinan banwa, hanggan ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo hanggan ka fanifonan magorang Hodyo sadik dahonya nangampangan wan. Ginya ta nagafos in Hisos a, nataban hanya han Pilato.
Ginya madis Pilato naintaw in Hisos, nalwang kitay, Haw awkin ka gorangon manga Hodyo? Is Hisos iglwang, Haw wa ngap kaglwang.
Aywan ka manga fagtahinan fagalan-han-Diyos igbangdan han Hisos.
Is Pilato naintaw ya domwag in Hisos, Kana kin ha nodwag sagot? Fandog kin kaaywanon ista manga sombong ha hyamo.
Dapat is Hisos idwa nasagot domwag. Yakangas Pilato kataka wan.
Ka manga Hodyo nogtohod ka Fanohodan Nagsagayan, is Pilato ha ogalig falfas sadik Hodyo kanporiso, no fakta ka manga Hodyo fakasayaon falfason.
Itfagonan ha manga taw iglaban ista gorangon hanggan wa nangadkatayan noglaban. Insadi ka nalaban is Barabas, kati maporisowan.
Ka fakaaywanan nalwang han Pilato, Haw fag idwag liyam im ogali. Ha fag falfas mandi sadik Hodyo kito ka nogbanwan.
Ginyas Pilato nasagot has taw kitay, Kinda nangos hayo fangayofan? Fag ka gorangon manga Hodyo awkin kangko falfason?
Maskin is Pilato naintaw ngatay fag is Hisos kat falfason, hanya natwa wa kitay kawa manga fagtahinan fag fagalan kaingli odin Hisos, yakanga ta nataban hanya han Pilato.
Dapat ka manga fagtahinan fag fagalan nafasognod has manga taw kaaywanon kitay, ta fag somagad gin Pilato fag is Barabas kat falfason.
Is Pilato naintaw has taw, iglwang sadi ya ginan, No kitonya, kana araw angko ibolonon has nwa fag ama ka hayo faglwangon gorangon manga Hodyo?
Ta nanarawagan di ngap, Fapakowan wa hanya sas nafatimbangan hayo.
Ginyas Pilato gintaw ya domwag has taw, Kana mayon? Kana kat naibolon dwat? Dapat ta labi wan nanarawagan marigon, Fapakowan hanya sas nafatimbangan hayo.

Maskin is Pilato kasaya kitay ka fakaaywanan fag manga taw fag igbaya hanya, ya nafalfas in Barabas. Ginya madis Pilato no nafabakbak in Hisos it manga sondalo, nafabahala hanya has taw kaarakitay ta fapako hanya sas nafatimbangan hayo.
Yakanga ka manga sondalo nataban in Hisos hasta gorangon basad balay dahol. Ta nafatifon sadi wak habanan sondalo san Hisos dayo.
Ka manga sondalo nafasolong di nga hanya sadik rotay aba, boragaw. Ta nahoskos di lamnon madogi a, nafasangbaw tonya in Hisos baba alfoyo.
Ginya ka manga sondalo igsway odi in Hisos, iglwang, Anod, kafiyaon mangharaw ka gorangon manga Hodyo.
Ta nabakbak in Hisos boknga alfoyo pinotol bagahay. Tagtofay hanya hanggan igsway odig lingkohodan hanya.
Ginya madi ta nonsagaya wagyod hanya, ta naloslos ya ka rotay boragaw, nafasolong ya in Hisos sadili rotay, hanggan nataban wa hanya has dayo, kaarakitay pomako wan sas nafatimbangan hayo.

Araw, ta no sawas boknga dalan, ta nahablang sadik ama goli has banwa git iyab, kawas Simon, taga Sirini, inda Alihandro da Rofo ama. Ka manga sondalo napilit wa nafafasan hanya ka nafatimbangan hayo kasta fag fapakowan araw in Hisos.
Ta nataban in Hisos ha sadik foyo, tagngayan Golgota, it kahologan Botol Alfoyo.
Ka manga sondalo nafagamit in Hisos langgaw ha aktom lamnon mira. Dapat is Hisos nadayo di.
Manga sondalo napako in Hisos sas nafatimbangan hayo, ginya ta nangafodan wan in Hisos manga rotay, tagpostahan no kinday nogfahafod.
Myanit faginan wa kaabwat ta no napako in Hisos sas nafatimbangan hayo.
Kasta sombong masoratan sat tongod alfoyo iglwang, Ka gorangon manga Hodyo.
Gis nanya yadi ta nafapako dowak tolisan, insadi san Hisos balis sihon, insadi san Hisos balis wala.
In-anod kansorat sas Kasoratan kitay, Ta nafatimbang hanya bilang sadik taw ha kasalanan.
Ka manga taw kagdalan sinya, igmaswag, igyod, mabaringan odista alfoyo, taglwang, Nabi, anod, haw ka domwat nangos ka Fanimbaan-Dahol, ginya fatobo ya tolo lamang ik sirang,
kati, bawiyan hyamo sadili. Fag dokson lamang gis nyamos fatimbangan hayo.

Kitonya yadi ka manga fagtahinan fagalan-han-Diyos, hanggan ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo noglibak in Hisos, tagtoltolan, Bati hanya nabawi ongay ka tiba taw, dapat not sadili wa habilogan, idyadi wa syagan igbawi.

Tagmaswag iglwang, Tonya fag in Diyos-natogon-Famawi, ka gorangon manga Israil, fag domokson nga kati gis nwa fag nafatimbangan hayo. Nontam wa mata lagan, tam imtiwala wan. Ka manga tolisan kanpako yadi san Hisos akbang nafasidyowan yadi hanya.
Ginya madi yabay, gis boknga wa sirang fiya fiya, balis myanit kabohid wan, sadi wak dahonya banwanan inharom wan.
Myanit no kabohid wan, is Hisos natawag marigon sas fangampangan Aramaik, Iloy, Iloy, lama sabaktani? It kahologan, Angko Diyos, angko Diyos, kana mayon haw nogfabayaan angko?
Tiba taw ka sinya malindogan, no nadog kitay is Hisos igtawag kitonya, taglwang, Yabay, igtawag in Iliyas.

Sadik taw nadalandan wan natogna famasopsop has basad langgaw maiglis, nasongkit sas tobwan bagahay, ginya nafasopsop in Hisos, iglwang has fakaaywanan, Faya, tam bomantay yap, ngatay is Iliyas imbangkad araw kaarakitay fadokson hanya.
Is Hisos natawag ya domwag marigon, ginya nafos wat ipsaw.
Ginya yabay, ka fanahop rotay sas fagbokngan Fanimbaan-Dahol inragyang sadi odi ginan, gis tongod has daga baliwa, namokngan wan.
Ka fagtahinan sondalo ka masayangowan in Hisos, no nalag no kinday in Hisos ipsaw no nafos, iglwang kitay, Bonwa bohag to fag ama in Diyos wa Anak.
Ha akwa yadi manga ina sinya mabantayan gis ayayo. Tonya fag manga ina tiba kawa da Mariya Magdalina, da Mariya inda Santyago sangay ina, hanggan in Hosi ina, hanggan is Salomi.
Gi yapdis sakop Galiliya to fag manga ina nogtahin in Hisos hanggan igtogbong hanya. Ha akwa yadi sinya tibak ina aywan kan Hisos manga ofod no hawas Hirosalim itfagonan.

Kawa myanit kasangday wan sas Sirang Famatalagan hanggan no marom Sirang Kafahowayan, is Hosi, gis banwa Arimatiya, inrigon it fangayofan, hawan Pilato, nasagad in Hisos habilogan. Is Hosi sadik ama ha kangayanan, sadi sas fanoltolan manga fagtahinan Hodyo. Hanyag fanaya no ginahin is Diyos nogfabago it sakop.
Dapat is Pilato gadowan ngatay is Hisos idya ha lahaw natay. No nafatawag ka fagtahinan has manga sondalo, naintaw hanya is Hisos ngatay natay wa ngay.
Is Pilato no nadog gis fagtahinan manga sondalo kawas Hisos natay wa ngay, nafaangay kitay is Hosi bol wa nga kan Hisos habilogan gis nafatimbangan hayo.

Is Hosi nasali sadik homot madamol fag rotay kafiyaon, ginya nabol in Hisos habilogan, nasafot basad homot. Ginyas Hosi nafaigyan in Hisos habilogan sas basad natigib lohib bato. Ginya madi nafabalolang bato dahol dahol it tahop sas sakbawan lohib.
Da Mariya Magdalina hanggan da Mariya in Hosi ina mabantayan yapdi hanggan ta nalag no sida nafwalid in Hisos habilogan.
Nonsagaya wan ka Sirang Kafahowayan, da Mariya Magdalina, da Mariya in Santyago ina, hanggan da Salomi nasali famabanglo kaarakitay fomiyad in Hisos habilogan.
No dayo kayawa sas sirang gona sa sadik simba, ka manga ina hawas lohib bato.
No boknga wa dalan tagtoltolan wagtoltolan wan kitay, Fakta araw ka fomalo intam bomoklas ka tahop bato gis boknga sakbawan lohib?
Ta no nabantay wan, taglag ka lohib fanahop bato in-oson wan has dayo sakbawan maskin kadaholon ka bato.
Ta nonsakbaw wa has basad lohib bato, ta nalag sadik anahan matokawan sas balis sihon, ha solong rotay abohay. Ka manga ina inhinol odi.

Ka anahan nalwang has taw, Ham fag idwa kahinol. Ka hayo fagsayahon is Hisos, taga Nasarit, kasta napako sas nafatimbangan hayo. Hanyan boyag ya domwag, idwastay. Ham bantayan ista nagfwalidan hanya is nwa.
Ham fag goli wan, fwayongan han Hisos manga katogbong, labi man han Pidro, kitay is Hisos gomona hayo has sakop Galiliya. Sinya ham bago di lomag hanya, kito kat togon hayo.
Ka manga ina nadokson di ngay gis lohib bato, nalagyo wan, karokog wa kadala, indolaw wan. Tadwa nafwayong nyawa hada fag taw maskin tandala wan.
Ka manga ina hawan da Pidro hanggan nafwayong has fagayo kasta lagan anahan, basad lohib, it nafwayong fagayo has taw.
Ginya madis Hisos nasogo kitay it manga katogbong fag bomarita ha sadik dahonya baba daga. Ta nafaadal has taw ka maliyaw hanggan maanod fag barita no kinday tam nombawi hanggan aban aban.
Dapat nyawa ta nadog kitay is Hisos inboyag ya, nyawa in Mariya wa mata lagan, tadya katiwala in Mariya fwayong.
Ginya madis Hisos nafalag it sadili hat katogbong dowa, ta noglahaw has moyod, dapat it fanwalongan in-oman.
Tanfwali ya has basad banwa, nafwayong han Hisos manga katogbong tiba kitay ta nalag wan Hisos. Dapat tadwa katiwala ista fwayong.

Ginya madis Hisos nafalag it sadili hat manga katogbong Safolo-ha-Sadi, ta no kwan fafa. Is Hisos nangabaya is taw, maskin maganit ista fangayofan, tadwa katiwala ista fwayong, nyawa kagfadog has taw nalag kitay is Hisos inboyag ya.
Ginyas Hisos natogon has taw, Ham fag hanya wan sadik baba daga, fwayongan ka Fiya fag Barita has fagayo fag manga taw.
Ka manga taw kantiwala hanggan igfatogna yadi hanya imbawi wan, dapat kadwam tiwala imtohoyan has fadosaan.
Ka mangam tiwala mamalag to fag manga falagon madolaw. Ta nogsyag angko, ta somyagan igfaalin manga labang gis taw, ta tomwa yadi homampang ka tiba fangampangan.
Nyawa abyanon homoskos hanya, hanggan nyawa ta domaya igfainom fakalangoon hanya, tadwam kinday. Ta nogfalangday it manga gamat has manga taw ha sagit, tamfiya wan.
Ginya madis Hisos nontabo wagtogon kiti hat manga katogbong, inabwat has tongod, intokaw san Diyos balis sihon.

Ginya madin Hisos manga katogbong nalahaw wan, natoltol has fagayo fag manga banwanan taw. Kagfon intam gofod yadi has taw gibolon, igfalag yadi manga falagon madolaw has manga taw kaarakitay igfaanod kitay orongan ista toltol.
Hogsorat ha hyamo, Tiyofilo, sadik taw ha kangayanan. Aywan fag manga taw danwa nasorat kawa hantam donggon ka manga nadalanan sa hyami banwanan itfagonan.
Ka manga nalag to fag manga bagay gis fabagowanan hanggan nafaadal in Diyos hampang, ka nafwayong ha hyami it mata lagan, ginya hyami ofod tiba nasorat yadi kasta nafwayong.
Ginya madi, aho no naintaw wa fiya fiya fagayo fag mangan anod gis fabagowanan, ho naisip yadi kitay hanggan aho somorat yadi wan sadik toltolan fiya wa donggon, idwa ha labi, idwa ha korang.
Hogsorat ha hyamo kaarakitay haw tomwa matohoyanan kitay, kam manga donggon orongan wan-anod kitonya.
Hyabi, nos Hirodis ka gorangon sas sakop Hodiya, ha sadik fagalan-han-Diyos san Abiyas habanan, it ngayan is Sakariyas, in Aaron hasokfonan. In Sakariyas babay is Ilisabit gi yadin Aaron hasokfonan.
Ka talsawa myasa wa kitonya in Diyos wa fagbayaon, katanog it manga togon fagayo fagayo.
Dapat ay, hanggan wa magorang tadya ha anak maskin is Ilisabit malayos.
Ginya madi yabay, in Sakariyas fag habanan, no gibolon ka fagalan bato ibolonon san Diyos faglagan, tagbahala sas Fanimbaan-Dahol.

Gis nanya, ta no nafaaraktoman ista manga ngayan, kito kasta ogali manga fagalan, in Sakariyas ngayan kasta nabol gis sohadan, yakanga hanya ka domiya sonogon kamangyan. Yakanga gis nanya fag masohod ta nogsonog kamangyan, is Sakariyas insakbaw han Diyos basad Fanimbaan-Dahol a,
kat fakaaywanan fag manga taw matifonan sas sokayan, igdarangin.
Ginyan sadi odi ginan, in Diyos anghil sadi dagos wa nafalag han Sakariyas, sawas balis sihon baliwa fagsonogan kamangyan.
Is Sakariyas no nalag ka anghil, inhinol wa a, indala wa dahol dahol.
Dapat ka anghil nafwayong han Sakariyas kitay, Haw fag idwa kadala, Sakariyas. Is Diyos nadog wa hyamo darangin. Ham da Ilisabit omanak yapdi anak ama aban. Fag is Hwan ham no ngomayan hanya.
Ham bomaya wa a, hamsolong yadi waglag, hanggan fagayo fag manga taw, ta bomaya waglag hanya no bago sagaya.

Hanyam bali wa ha kangayanan dahol aban san Diyos faglagan. Hayo anak aban fag idwa ominom alak, nyawa kana fag fakalangoon. Gi yapdit ina basad tiyan, ka Maliyaw fag Falad danwa sa hanya sadi wak dahonya fangayofan aban.
Tonya hayo anak ama ka fafwali ya aban hasta fakatiwalaon fag Diyos, hasagfon has taw, kaaywanon in Israil manga hasokfonan fag manga taw.

Tonya hayo anak ama ka gomona man kagfon intam, hanggan ka fangayofan hanggan karigonan ka nafasyagan in Diyos fangampang is Iliyas hyabi, mamasyagan yadi hanya. Imbali wa kitonya kaarakitay hanyag faamigosan ya ka manga ama hat manga anak, hanggan fafwali ya ka mangag sway has fiya fag ogali. Ginya madi yabay, sadik tifonan taw imtalaga han Diyos.
Is Sakariyas nalwang has anghil kitay, Kinday ho no tomwa matohoyanan kitay ha akwa anak aban, maskin aho magorang wa dahol kati, hanggan angko babay, mi myasa wa kitonya.
Ka anghil nasagot, Ahos Gabriyal ka gibolon san Diyos atobangan. Is Diyos nasogo angko ha hyamo kaarakitay fomwayong hyamo kangko nafadog fiya fag barita ha hyamo kati haraw.
Maskin hadwa katiwala kangko fwayong hyamo, gis kati ginan haw imbali wa boyon hanggan bongkok no kandogay day nodyam anod.
Gis nanya yabay, no bali day is Sakariyas idyan dokson, ka manga taw mafanayan yapdi sas sokayan. Tandolaw wan no kana mayon nondogay sas basad Fanimbaan-Dahol.
Ginya hanya nondokson wan, fawa twa kampang has taw, igfaaman odi. Yakanga ta natwa wa kitay hanya ha lagan madolaw sas basad Fanimbaan-Dahol.
Nonsagaya in Sakariyas habanan taranggapan ibolon, is Sakariyas nwali wa hat balay.
Ginya madi yabay, fawa dogay, is Ilisabit gabosog wan. Manga limak magdanon, is Ilisabit idwa galin galin git balay.
Is Ilisabit nalwang, Kati yabay is Diyos bago dinawa angko, naibolon kito kaarakitay tadwa ha fagwason aban kitay, hodwa ha anak.
Is Ilisabit no onom wak magdanon gabosog, is Diyos nasogo ya ka anghil Gabriyal

has banwa Nasarit, sakop Galiliya, ha sadik dayaga, it ngayan is Mariya. Is Mariya idya nangindogan. No kitay di, is Mariya ha bato wa indoganon, is Hosi, sadik ama gin Dabid ha sokfonan, ka gorangon fag Dabid.
Ka anghil nondasog has oliyanan dayaga, naakbang wa a, nafasayagdog hanya kiti, Yabay yabay, is Diyos igbaya wa hyamo, sawa yadi hyamo.
Dapat is Mariya indolaw wa dahol dahol igdog kat nafwayong a, nangayfanan wa fiya fiya no kanat kahologan ka anghil no kampang kitonya.
Yakanga ka anghil nafwayong hanya, Mariya, haw fag idwa kadala, maskin haw in Diyos wa fagbayaon.
Haw fag talinga wan. Haw imbali gabosog hanggan omanak yadi sadik anak ama. Haw aban ngomayan hanya is Hisos.

Hanyam bali dahol it kangayanan hanggan ta lomwang yadi kitay kat Ama is Diyos ka ha kangayanan abwat man has fagayo fagayo. Is Diyos, kagfon intam, fatokaw yadim Anak, san Dabid it hafofowan nagtokawan fanokawan gorangon hyabi.
Ginya madi hanya bomahala han Hakob manga hasokfonan hanggan aban aban. Hanya nombali wa gorangon idwa ha katabowanan nogbahala.
Is Mariya naintaw has anghil, Kinday nom-anod tonya kawa hodyan saya ama?

Ka anghil nasagot, Ka Maliyaw fag Falad domokson ha hyamo a, ka Abwat-man-has-Fagayo-Fagayo it karigonan ka lomanbong ha hyamo. Yakanga kam fasagayaon fag anak aban imtohoyan han Diyos, hanggan it ngayan in Diyos wa Anak.
Ha awkin idwag tohod in Ilisabit im kaiban? Nyawa magorang wan, gabosog kati a, sadik anak ama aban it fagfasagayaon. Kati faonom wa fag magdanon hanya no gabosog, nyawa hyabi taglwang hanya baog.
Maskin nyawa kana fag madolaw idwa hagsagaya in Diyos fagsyaganon.
Is Mariya nasagot, Aho intam Fon sogowan. Nyawa kana kam nafwayong angko fag im-anod wan. Ginya yabay ka anghil naobon wan Mariya.
Ginya madis Mariya idwa dogay nadagos wan has manga moyod sakop Hoda hawas sadik banwa sinya.
Is Mariya nonsakbaw han Sakariyas balay, nahampang masaya wagdog han Ilisabit.
Is Ilisabit no nadog in Mariya hampang, ka anak san Ilisabit basad tiyan nahimot marigon. Ka Maliyaw fag Falad sawan Ilisabit basad fangayofan sadi wak dahonya,
ginyas Ilisabit nahampang marigon a, nalwang han Mariya, Haw bomaya wan bohondi kitos iba ina hanggan kam fagfasagayaon fag anak aban bomaya yadi.
Hodwa ha fangayofan kitay, kambali angko Fon it ina manabang angko.
Maskin aho no nadog hyamo hampang, haw no kadasog, ka anak sangko basad tiyan nabaya wan, nahimot marigon.
Maskin haw nasyag kitay, im-anod wan kagfon intam nafwayong ha hyamo, git anghil, haw bomaya wan.
Ginya madis Mariya nasagot in Ilisabit kiti, Angko fangayofan igfasayagdog kagfon intam,
Angko fangayofan igbaya in Diyos angko Famawi,
Maskin nyawa ahot sogowan odi, hanyan-awa wangko. Gis kati ginan hanggan wa aban, maskin is Diyos kadwa ha bosal
Naibolon sangko madolaw, fagayo fag manga taw lomwang kitay, aho ka bomaya wan. Is Diyos maliyaw wan.
Hanya kaawa ka manga katanog hanya gis fagayo fagayo fag manga hasokfonan taw.
In Diyos manga ibolon igfalag has taw it karigonan, Hanyag fasarowayan yadi ka manga ha takan.
Hanya nafaalin manga gorangon git kangayanan a, Nafaabwat it kangayanan ka mangadwa ha takan.
Nafahapsog manga fiya fag fanganon ka manga kalonos, Dapat ay, nasogo ka manga maakwa, nyawadwa ha nahwan.
Maskin igfaanod it togonan hantam manga magorang, Hanya natogbong in Israil manga hasokfonan, in Diyos manga sogowan,
Kawa tonya wat togonan han Abraham hanggan hat manga hasokfonan hanggan aban aban.
Is Mariya nandogayan san Ilisabit balay tolok magdanon, ginya madi nwali wan.
Ginya madi aban, nondasog in Ilisabit anak kasagayan fag masohod, yabay insagaya anak nga ama.
It manga faakbang balay hanggan kaiban, no nadog kitay kagfon intam inawa wa dahol in Ilisabit, ta nagobok wa ngap hanya, igbaya yadi wa ngap iglag.
Ginya madi, ta nogfatoli ka anak dararag sas fawalo fag sirang, tonya fag manga taw nafasakop yadi sinya. Ta gayfan kitay is Sakariyas nogfangayan it anak, is Sakariyas mandi, kito mandi it ama.
Dapat ay, it ina nalwang, Bohonwas Sakariyas, is Hwan di kat ngayan.
Dapat taglwang, Ngadi sadi sa hayo kaiban idwa ha ngayan kitonya.
Yakanga ta nafaaman odin Sakariyas it ama, ta no gintaw hanya no faktaw kat fakasayaon it anak ngayan.
Is Sakariyas nafaaman, nanagad soratan a, ginya nasorat kiti, It ngayan is Hwan. Fagayo indolaw wan.
Ginya sadi wa ginan is Sakariyas nahampang ya, nafasayagdog in Diyos.
Ka manga taga sinya fag banwanan, fagayo fagayo, indolaw wa dahol, yakanga igfadadahitan ha sadi ha sadi kat manga lagan, sadi wak dahonya manga banwanan sas manga moyod sakop Hodiya.
Fagayo ka nadog naayfan wa fiya fiya no kanat kahologan, maskin kalag wa kitay, is Diyos sinya wa fag anak, ka manga taw garintawan yadi, Kinday mayon aban to fag anak?
Ginya madi ka Maliyaw fag Falad sawan Sakariyas in Hwan ama, sadi wak dahonya fangayofan. Ginyas Sakariyas inbalin Diyos fangampang, nalwang kito,
Maskin kagfon in Israil manga hasokfonan, is Diyos, in-awa waglag hanggan nafalo nafalfas it sakop, Yakanga tam fag fasayagdog hanya.
Hanya nafabangkad yadi hantam sadik Famaliwa, marigon wa dahol, Hanyan Diyos sogowan is Dabid, it hasokfonan.
Hyabi hyabi is Diyos ha togonan hantam git manga fangampang maliyaw kitay,
hanya bomawi intam gintam manga kalaban Hanggan gis manga taw ka kadwat iglag intam.
Hanya ha togonan yadi hantam manga magorang kitay, hanya kaawa has taw. Hanya tomohod yadit fiya fag taranggapan.
To kan Diyos nafatohoyan fiya fiya hantam hafofowan fag ama is Abraham kitay,
Hanya bomawi intam gintam manga kalaban, Kaarakitay tam somyagan mamasayagdog hanya, idwa ha fakadalaon,
Imbali maliyaw hanggan maslong intam manga ogali sat faglagan, no kandogay day tam no boyagan yapdi.

Kati haw man angko anak kangko fagwason. Maskin haw gomona kagfon intam, kaarakitay igfatalagat manga bato lahawan, Yakanga ta ngomayan hyamo kitay, haw wat fangampang, ka Abwat-man-has-fagayo-fagayo-it-kangayanan.
Haw fomwayong hat sakop no kinday ta nombawi, No kinday it manga ogali dwat nomliyam.
Maskin intam Diyos maawaon wa dahol dahol, Ka mayawa ka bomawi intam kaakbang wagfayawa intam,
Kaarakitay igyawa ka manga basad marom yapdi, ka manga sas daga gohom kahatayan, Hanggan tomaban intam has dalan kahowayan.
Ka anak, is Hwan, no kadahol wan, kabali yadi marigon it fangayofan a, nabanwanan basad fakahyabogan nodyan bali ha bantog sas manga banwanan Israil.

Gis nanya fag manga masohod, is Sisar Agosto ka gorangon sas fagayo fag layonan daga ka banwa Roma sakop sadi wak dahonya. Is Sisar Agosto nalwang kitay fagayo fagayo fag manga taw sas sakop Roma fag falistat manga ngayan.
Toy ka gona fag nafalista nos Kiriniyo hyabi ka gobirnador sas Siriya.
Yakanga fagayo fag manga taw nwali hat magorang banwanan kaarakitay mamalista it manga ngayan.
Is Hosi nalahaw gis banwa Nasarit, sakop Galiliya, hawas sakop Hodiya, has banwa Bitlihim kan Dabid nakasagayan fag banwa hyabi, maskin is Hosi in Dabid hasokfonan.
Is Mariya, kan Hosi bato babayon, nahin yadi wan Hosi kaarakitay mamalista yadit ngayan. Is Mariya danwa gabosog gis nanya.
Ta no sinya yapdi, natoon wa ngap sinyat anak kasagayan.

Ginyas Mariya nafasagaya wa sinya, sas banwa Bitlihim, kat anak ahan, anak ya ngadi ama. Is Mariya nafasafot manga rotay hat anak dararag. Ginya madi, kawa napno wa manga taw kasta balay bato hadasogan, yakanga ta nafaigyan odi ka anak dararag sas basad fanganan manga hayopan.
Dayo gis nanya fag manga masohod, ha manga gano topa basad yabi sas bahalan banwa, hawas talon baliwa.
Ginya madi, sadi wa ginan, in Diyos anghil sadi inbangkad hasta akbang a, in Diyos masilaw wa dahol fag kayawaan nayawa sasta ligongan. Ka manga gano topa indala wa dahol dahol iglag.
Dapat ka anghil nalwang has taw, Ham fag idwa kadala. Fandog ngay, aho ha fwayongon ha hayo fiya fag barita a, fagayo fag manga taw imsaya wagdog.
Maskin kati hayo Famawi insagaya wan san Dabid banwa, kawan Diyos-natogon-Famawi, kagfon intam.
Ka fatohoyan hayo no sida fag anak, ham lomag tonya fag anak dararag masafotan manga rotay a, maigyanan sas basad fanganan hayopan.
Ginya madi, sadi wa ginan, sadik habanan anghil gin Diyos banwanan sam tongod, inbangkad has anghil gona akbang. Tagfasayagdog in Diyos kiti,
Fag fasayagdog in Diyos sat banwanan sam tongod, Hanggan kan Diyos fagbayaon fag manga taw istay is baba daga fag lomag yadi kahowayan.

Ginya madi, ka manga anghil no nwali han Diyos banwanan sam tongod, ka manga gano topa nanoltolan a, taglwang, Kalibang, tam hawas basad banwa Bitlihim. Tam mamantay ngay ka madolaw sinya kagfon intam nafadog hantam.
Ginya ta nalahaw madali hanya a, ta nasayak inda Mariya, da Hosi hanggan ta nalag yadi anak dararag sinya, maigyanan basad fanganan hayopan.
Ta no nalag di ngay, ta natoltol has taw it donggon ka anghil fwayong, kawa has nwa fag anak dararag.
Fagayo fag manga taw ka nadog ka manga gano topa fwayong indolaw wa dahol.
Dapat is Mariya fagaba wa maayfanan to fagayo kan-anod kitonya.
Ka manga gano topa nwali wa a, igfasayagdog in Diyos, igbaya hanya kawat donggon hanggan it manga lagan fagayo, kito kan anghil fwayong has taw.
Nondasog ka fawalo fag sirang git kasagayan, ta natoli ka anak dararag, hanggan nafangayan hanya is Hisos. Is Mariya nodya gabosog, ka anghil danwa nadisag it ngayan tonya.

Ginya madi, nondasog ka sirang gis nanya ta nogfatonglos ka ogali kan Mwisis natogon kawa has manga nafasagaya anak, hasaglinay baliwa, ka talanahan nalahaw has banwa Hirosalim. Maskin in Diyos togon iglwang, Fagayo fag anak ama it ahan, ham fakoray hasagfon intam, yakanga, ta nadiya yadi wa ka anak dararag kaarakitay fabangkad has fagalan-han-Diyos faglagan.
Ta nadisag yadi kasta bato disagon no kana kan Diyos togon iglwang, kitos sadik talsawa manok bilang tokmo, ngatay dowak anak salompati.

Gis nanya fag manga masohod ha sadik ama sas Hirosalim, it ngayan is Simyon. Kalag wa kitay hanya galwasi in Diyos maskin matanogon a, igfanaya odi kitay no ginahin nangos is Diyos nogbawi in Israil sakop. Ka Maliyaw fag Falad sawan Simyon fangayofan,
hanggan nafatagak hanya kitay, hadya matay ha lomag yapdin Diyos-natogon-Famawi.

Ka Maliyaw fag Falad nataban in Simyon has basad Fanimbaan-Dahol. Ginya madi, it manga magorang no nadiya ka anak, kawas Hisos, ha basad Fanimbaan-Dahol kaarakitay igfatonglos kan Diyos togon fagsagadon,
is Simyon nababa ka anak, nabaya in Diyos, nalwang kiti,

Haw kagfon angko, maskin angko wa mata lagan ka Famawi manga taw, Kam nafatalaga sasta faglagan fagayo, ka mamayawa has manga Hintil, Hanggan gi hanya, manga taw mamasayag dog ha hyamo sakop sas Israil. Yakanga, in-anod wan kam fwayong angko. Nyawa aho, im sogowan, gomona was taw kati, fiya was fangayofan.
Ka anak dararag manga magorang indolaw wagdog in Simyon fwayong kawa han Hisos.

Is Simyon nafasayag dog inda Hosi kitay ta bomaya wan, ginya madi nafwayong han Mariya kitay, Haw fag danwa twa kitay, to fag anak danwan talaga kaarakitay aywan fag manga taga Israil omayayo gin Diyos, dapat aywan yadi ka omakbang. Is Diyos nasogo to fag anak hastay, sadik falagon madolaw, dapat aywan ka yomod hanya.
Yakanga ista manga basad fangayofan imlag wa fiya fiya. Haw domog yadi aban kitay, bilang wa ha dagom matobohan sa hyamo basad fangayofan.

Gis nanya yadi ha sadik ina in Diyos fangampang sinyas basad Fanimbaan-Dahol, it ngayan is Ana, in Fanwil anak, in Asir hasokfonan. Is Ana magorang wa dahol. Fitok fangaraw lamang hyabi, hanya no gofodan hat indogan,

ginya madit indogan natay wan, yakanga hanyan balo yadi wan kati. It kagorangan walok safolo ha ofat ik fangaraw. In Ana ibolon ha odis basad Fanimbaan-Dahol, yabi sirang, igfasayagdog in Diyos. Nomtoon idwa kwan hanon kaarakitay mandarangin.

Gis nanya yadi, is Ana naakbang handa Hosi, nafasalamat han Diyos. Hanya natoltol yadi, kawa han Hisos baliwa, has fagayo ka manga mafanayan no ginahin is Diyos no bomawi ka banwa Hirosalim gis mahori.
Da Hosi da Mariya, no nafatonglos fagayo fag manga bagay ka maangay han Diyos togon has manga Hodyo, ta nwali ya ngawan hat sadili banwanan has banwa Nasarit, sakop Galiliya.
Ka anak kadahol wan a, inbali marigon it fangayofan hanggan madonong ya ngadi, maskin in Diyos kafiyan sawa hanya.
Yabay, fangaraw fangaraw, sas Fanohodan Nagsagayan, manga Hodyo nogtohod ka anghil no nasagaya ista manga balay hyabi, in Hisos manga magorang has banwa Hirosalim.
Is Hisos no safolo wa ha dowak fangaraw it kadogayan, hanyag tahin yadi wat manga magorang, ta no has Hirosalim kito kasta ogali nogbanwan.
Nonsagaya ka Fanohodan, ta nwali ya nga wan. Is Hisos in-goyan yapdi sas Hirosalim dapat it manga magorang idwa naisip kitay hanyan goyan.

Ta gayfan ngatay is Hisos nahoyog yapdi has iba taw, yakanga ta nafadagos yapdit lahawan sadi wak sirangan. Ta no nasayak hat manga kaiban hanggan hat manga fakilalaon, ta bago di natwa kitay, is Hisos idwa mangharaw natahin it manga magorang.
Ta nodwa nalag in Hisos, tanfwali ya has banwa Hirosalim kaarakitay somayak hanya.
Sayas fatolo fag sirang ta bago di nalag in Hisos, ya mangharaw, sadis basad Fanimbaan-Dahol, matokawan sinya maofodan yadi ka mangag faadal. Hanya matalingan has taw, ginya gintaw yadi.
Fagayo ka nadog in Hisos hampang tandolaw wa dahol kitay hanya madonong mangharaw, twa yadig sagot has taw.
Hanggan it manga magorang intaka wan, ta no nalag hanya, it inag lwang, Anak, kana mayon haw no kitonya ha hyami? Aho hanggan im ama, minyaya wa galingawan hyamo mi nogsayak hyamo.
Is Hisos nasagot, Kana mayon ham nogsayak angko? Ham awkin idwa natwa kitay aho fag sawangko Ama balay?
Dapat tadwa natwagdog in Hisos nafwayong, no kanat kahologan.
Is Hisos natahin ya ngawan it manga magorang a, nwali ya has banwa Nasarit, nafasakop fiya fiya hat manga magorang. It ina naayfan fiya fiya to fag manga bagay fagayo sat basad fangayofan.
Is Hisos kadahol wan gis nanya, madonong ya ngadi. Labi was Diyos hanggan manga taw igbaya wa dahol dahol hanya.

Ginya madi aban, sas fasafolo ha lima fag fangaraw, nos Tibiriyo Sisar kasta abwat fag gorangon sas manga layonan daga ka sakop Roma, is Ponsiyo Pilato ka gobirnador sas sakop Hodiya, is Hirodis kasta gorangon, no sas sakop di Galiliya, hanggan kaman it fadwasay, is Filipi, ka gorangon sas manga sakop di Itoriya hanggan Tarakoniti. Is Lisaniyas ka gorangon sas sakop di Abiliniya.

Gis nanya da Anas da Kayfas ka tarogbongan gorangon fag fagalan-han-Diyos. Gis nanya fag masohod is Hwan, in Sakariyas anak no maoliyanan sas basad fakahyabogan, is Diyos nafadog hanya it bato toltolon has taw.

Yakangas Hwan nasafong wa bali bali difay safa Hordan, igfaadal has taw. Hanyag lwang, Ham fag soyo, fag dayo yadi hayo manga ogali dwat. Ham fag fatogna hayo kaarakitay ha tandaan sas danom kagfatohoyan has taw kitay ham igsoyo, hanggan is Diyos faliyam wa fagayo hayo manga naogali dwat.
Kito kansorat san Isayas, in Diyos fangampang, sorat kitay, Kiti kat nafwayong kagtawag marigon marigon, gis basad fakahyabogan, Fatalagaan in Diyos bato lahawan, Fahaslongan it manga dalan fagayo.
Dafogan ka manga losot, Hodkodan, fadatagan ka manga moyod, manga fongso, Fahaslongan ka dalan igbarikwangan, Fasohodan fiya fiya ka manga losot garogbot garogbot.
Ginya madi fagayo fag manga taw lomag no kinday is Diyos nogbawi manga taw.

Aywan fag manga taw ka nagobok in Hwan kaarakitay mamatogna. Is Hwan iglwang has manga taw, Ham bilang odi manga abyanon no madaya. Fakta kagfatagak hayo kitay ham fag lagyo wan gin Diyos fadosaan ka kadasog aban?

Fag hanggan wa hayo manga bohad ogali kagfalag kitay ham igsoyo wan. Ham fag idwa kasyag kitay maskin ham in Abraham manga hasokfonan, ya fiya wan. Gwadi hogfwayong ha hayo kitay gistay fag manga bato is Diyos syagan kalig in Abraham manga hasokfonan orongan.
Gis kati ginan ka wasay danwan hatak sas dalid hayo, omobang fagayo fagayo fag manga fon hayo kadwa fiya it bohad a, omokas wa has basad afoy.
Ginya ka fakaaywanan fag manga taw gintaw in Hwan, No kitonya mangharaw, kana ka hyami bato ibolonon kaarakitay midwam sakop has fadosaan?
Is Hwan nasagot, Hayo balokas no dowa, disagan wa ka sadi hasadwa akwa. Ka manga ha hanon fag kitonya yadi, disagan hasadwa akwa.
Mangag falo igsohot ka gobirno Roma bohis indasog wan han Hwan maskin kasaya mamatogna. Ta naintaw yadi han Hwan kitay, Haw kagfaadal, kinda odi hami?
Is Hwan iglwang has manga fanohot bohis, Ham fag idwag sagad iglabi ka fiya hayo fagsagadon.
Ka manga sondalo naintaw yadin Hwan, Hami yadi, kinda odi? Hanyag lwang, Nyawa ham igsagad, fag idwag logos is taw. Fag idwag fadala nodwa orongan. Ham fag idwag manaw hayo tangdanan.
Gis nanya fag masohod aywan fag manga taw mafanayan odi no ginahin in Diyos-natogon-Famawi nombangkad, yakanga kat fakaaywanan naayfan kitay ngatay is Hwan kasta fagfanayaon.

Dapat is Hwan nafwayong has taw, No kitay di, sas danom aho nogfatogna hayo, dapat ha akwa ya kadasog aban, ka madonong man angko, hanya ka fatogna hayo sas Maliyaw fag Falad, hanggan sas afoy. Ho kaya wa manlohas it siyok lapak.
Hanya ha bitbit fanayang kaarakitay falayon it opa, manga ohot. Tomifon it tirigo sas basad dongdong, dapat ay, somonog wa ka manga ohot sas afoy kadwa kapsa.
Yakanga aywan yapdi fag manga fatagak in Hwan fagtoltolon has taw nogfadog ka Fiya fag Barita.
Dapat is Hwan nangabaya in Hirodis, kasta gorangon, maskin kahagaw in Filipi babay, is Hirodiyas, it tagyaw yadi. Bohondi tonya kan Hirodis naibolon dwat kan Hwan fakabayaon.
Yakangas Hirodis nadogang ya to kat kasalanan, hanya nafaporiso yadin Hwan.
Itfagonan, fagayo fagayo fag manga taw no nafatogna wan, hanggan is Hisos nafatogna yadi. Ginyas Hisos nogdarangin yapdi, ka banwa sas tongod inboklas wan.
Ka Maliyaw fag Falad, bilang wa salompati, nayokfo han Hisos. Ginya ha nahasnog gin Diyos banwanan sam tongod, iglwang kitay, Haw wa kangko fagalwasiyon fag Anak, hogbaya wa dahol dahol hyamo.
Is Hisos manga wa tolok safolok fangaraw it kagorangan bago digfaadal has taw. Ista fangayofan is Hisos in Hosi odi anak. In Hosi hafofowan gin Adan ginan kiti,

Bago bago is Adan bilang wan Diyos anak. Ginyan Adan anak is Sit. Ginyan Sit anak is Inos. Ginyan Inos anak is Kainan. In Kainan anak is Mahalalil. In Mahalalil anak is Harid. In Harid anak is Inok. In Inok anak is Matosalim. In Matosalim anak is Lamik. In Lamik anak is Nowi. In Nowi anak is Sim. In Sim anak is Arfaksad. In Arfaksad anak is Kainan. In Kainan anak is Sala. In Sala anak is Hibir. In Hibir anak is Pilig. In Pilig anak is Ragaw. In Ragaw anak is Sirog. In Sirog anak is Nakor. In Nakor anak is Tira. In Tira anak is Abraham. In Abraham anak is Isaak. In Isaak anak is Hakob. In Hakob anak is Hoda. In Hoda anak is Faris. In Faris anak is Isrom. In Isrom anak is Arni. In Arni anak is Admin. In Admin anak is Aminadab. In Aminadab anak is Naason. In Naason anak is Salmon. In Salmon anak is Boos. In Boos anak is Obid. In Obid anak is Hisi. In Hisi anak is Dabid. In Dabid anak is Natan. In Natan anak is Matata. In Matata anak is Mainan. In Mainan anak is Miliya. In Miliya anak is Iliyakim. In Iliyakim anak is Honan. In Honan anak is Hosi. In Hosi anak is Hoda. In Hoda anak is Simyon. In Simyon anak is Libi. In Libi anak is Matat. In Matat anak is Horin. In Horin anak is Ilyasar. In Ilyasar anak is Hoswi. In Hoswi anak is Ir. In Ir anak is Ilmodam. In Ilmodam anak is Kosam. In Kosam anak is Adi. In Adi anak is Milki. In Milki anak is Niri. In Niri anak is Saltiyal. In Saltiyal anak is Sorobabil. In Sorobabil anak is Risa. In Risa anak is Hoana. In Hoana anak is Hoda. In Hoda anak is Hosi. In Hosi anak is Simi. In Simi anak is Matatiyas. In Matatiyas anak is Maat. In Maat anak is Nagi. In Nagi anak is Isli. In Isli anak is Nahom. In Nahom anak is Amos. In Amos anak is Matatiyas. In Matatiyas anak is Hosi. In Hosi anak is Hanan. In Hanan anak is Milki. In Milki anak is Libi. In Libi anak is Matat. In Matat anak is Ili. Ginya madin Ili anak kawas Hosi. To fag is Hosi kasta fangayofan in Hisos wa ama.
Gis nanya ka Maliyaw fag Falad sawan Hisos fangayofan sadi wak dahonya, hanggan is Hisos nwali ya gis safa Hordan. Ka Maliyaw fag Falad nataban in Hisos has basad fakahyabogan.
Is Hisos no sinya wan, is Fandaya nasolay igfaloksowan hanya ofat ik safolok sirang. Is Hisos idwa ha nahwan hanon kandogay inya, yakanga kalonos wa dahol dahol.
Ginyas Fandayag lwang han Hisos, Haw non Diyos wa nga Anak, haw fag lwang has nwa fag bato, Fag imbali tinapay.
Dapat is Hisos nasagot hanya, Insorat kitay, Bohondi ka odi fanganon kagfaboyag manga taw.
Ginyas Fandaya nataban in Hisos has abwat, sas fakabantayan, nafalag hanya, sadi wa ginan, ka manga gorangon sakop fagayo fagayo sadik dahonya baba daga.

Ginyas Fandayag lwang han Hisos, Haw no ha ngangkok manimba, ho domisag ha hyamo to fag manga gorangon sakop, it manga kangayanan hanggan kafiyan fagayo, maskin to fagayo indisag wa hangko a, kati ho domisag wan nyawa faktaw kangko fakasayaon disagan.
Is Hisos nasagot, nalwang, Insorat kitay, Fag is Diyos kagfon hyamo kam fagsimbaon. Fag hanya lamang kam fakatanogon.
Ginya madis Fandaya nataban ya in Hisos has baba atop Fanimbaan-Dahol sas Hirosalim, iglwang han Hisos, Haw non Diyos wa nga Anak, fadagdagan hyamo gistay is baba atop, ham daga is baba daga,
maskin insorat kitay, Hanya tomogon it manga anghil kitay, ta fag omano hyamo,
insorat yadi kitay, Ta somambot di hyamo kaarakitay im bitis idwam-iktan has bato.
Dapat is Hisos nasagot, Ka Kasoratan iglwang, Haw fag idwag tikis igsolay kagfon hyamo, hyamo Diyos.
Is Fandaya nontabo wagsolay igfaloksowan in Hisos git manga halimbawan fagayo, naobon ya nga wan Hisos a, igfanaya nangos no ginahin fag masohod aban no somolay ya hanya.
Is Hisos infwali ya has sakop Galiliya a, in Diyos Maliyaw fag Falad karigonan sawa hanya. In Hisos manga toltol hanggan ibolon indahit wan sas ligongan.
Is Hisos nafaadal has taw sasta manga basad fanimbaan. Fagayo fag manga taw nafasayagdog hanya.

Ginyas Hisos nwali has banwa Nasarit hat nakadaholan fag banwa. Is Hisos nasakbaw has basad fanimbaan sas Sirang Kafahowayan kito kat ogali nogbanwan. Is Hisos nalindog kaarakitay bomasa gis Kasoratan.
Ta nafagamit hanya in Isayas, in Diyos fangampang kasoratan malohotan. Is Hisos naladlad ka kasoratan kansorat kito, ginya nabasa wan,

Kati in Diyos Maliyaw fag Falad sawangko Maskin hanya nafili wangko kaarakitay ho manoltol ka Fiya fag Barita has manga myabog. Hanya nasogo angko kaarakitay igfadog hasta manga napilit nataban kitay, ta malfas ya, Fadog yadi has manga bota kitay, ista manga mata imfoga ya, Kaarakitay fomalfas kasta fagfahoriyon.
Fadog yadi has taw kitay, kati fag fangaraw kagfon intam falag it kahowayan has taw.
Is Hisos nalohot ya ngawan ka Kasoratan, nafwali ya hasag bahala, ginya madis Hisos intokaw ya. Fagayo ka sas basad fanimbaan indolaw wagdog, ta nabantay in Hisos.
Ginya madis Hisos igfwayong has taw, Ka hayo donggon gis Kasoratan in-anod wa kati.
Fagayo nafasayagdog hanya a, tandolaw wa dahol kawa kafiyaon maskin nogtoltol. Ta garintawan, Bohonwa awkin in Hosi anak to?

Yakangas Hisos iglwang, Ham ngandayo somokfon to fag fwayongon, Haw kagbolong has taw, fag im sadili yap im fagbolongon. Ham lomwang yadi hangko, Ibolonan yadistay sam sadili banwanan kito ka hyami donggon kam naibolon sas banwa Kapirnaom.
Is Hisos igfadagos yapdig fwayong kitay, Hogfwayong ha hayo kitay orongan wan, idwa ha akwa in Diyos fangampang kabantog sat sadili banwanan.

Dapat hogfwayong hayo kitay, hyabi hyabi, san Iliyas fag kasohodan, nodwa nahwayan tolok fangaraw hagboknga, yakanga malonos wa dahol sadi wak dahonya banwanan, gis nanya, bonwa bohag, aywan ka manga ina balo sas Israil.
Dapat ay, is Diyos idwa nafalahaw in Iliyas has ina balo sas Israil, dapat ha sadik ina balo sas Saripta, sakop Sidon.
San Ilisiyo man fag kasohodan, no kitay di, kaaywanon fag manga taw ka ha sagit kitong sas banwanan manga Israil, dapat idwa hanfiya ngadi sadi. Kan Diyos nafafiya is Naaman lamang, gis sakop Siriya.
Ta no nadog in Hisos manga hampang, fagayo ka sas basad fanimbaan kaisog wa dahol.
Ta nanhalindogan, natawid marigon in Hisos boknga takyay ginya nataban hanya has sokayan banwa has bohid has baba dalifi kaarakitay ta fomolid hanya ha basad gobang.
Dapat ay, is Hisos nalahaw lamang hasta fagbokngan a, nwali wan.
Ginya madis Hisos hawas lwad has banwa Kapirnaom, sakop Galiliya. Sas Sirang Kafahowayan, is Hisos igfaadal has manga taw sinya.
Tantaka wagdog is Hisos nogfaadal is taw maskin kitos ha kangayanan no kampang, idwag hono.
Sinyas basad fanimbaan, ha sadik ama, labang wa kagfahoriyan hanya, igtawag marigon kitay,
Yabay, haw Hisos taga Nasarit, kana haw nogmawat hyami. Haw awkin hastay kaarakitay domaog wa hyami? Ho fadi wadtwa no fakta haw. Haw ka Maliyaw kanbangkad gin Diyos.

Dapat is Hisos nangabaya ka labang, nalwang, Ha hawa gawang gawang. Haw fag galin wa gis nyamo fag taw. Ginya madi, sasta faglagan fagayo, ka labang nafahakfo wa dagos ka ama, ginya madi nalin lamang, idwa nafabaran ka ama.
Fagayo fag manga taw intaka wan, ta nangarintawan ha sadi ha sadi kitay, Kana ti fag manga hampang? Ha kangayanan, marigon ya ngadi, nogfasognod ka manga labang, ta katanog yadi wa galin.
Ka barita kawan Hisos manga ibolon indahit ha sadik dahonya sinya fag manga banwanan.
Is Hisos nalahaw wa gis fanimbaan, nasakbaw han Simon balay. Gis nanya in Simon nogang ina ha sagit, kagnaw wa dahol dahol, yakanga tagfaaronganon han Hisos kitay, Haw nangos fafiyaan yap hanya.
Is Hisos nalindog sas ina dayo igyanan a, nasogo kitay ka hagnaw fag galin wa gi hanya. Ka ina infiya wan, dagos wanbangon, ogali man di, nanogbong was taw.
Araw, myanit no kasangday wan, ista manga kahilala nataban han Hisos fagayo fagayo ka ha manga sagit, bokod bokod. Is Hisos nafwalid it gamat ha sadi ha sadi, hanggan nafafiya fagayo.

Manga labang nalin wa gis aywan fag manga taw, igsohodan wagharokyawan kitay, Haw in Diyos wa Anak. Dapat is Hisos nangabaya ka manga labang, idwa nafaawang maskin ka manga labang kilala wa kitay is Hisos wa kan Diyos-natogon-Famawi.
Ginya madi, no bago marom, is Hisos nabisok has talon. Ka manga taw galingawan in Hisos. Ta no nalag ya nga hanya, taglwang, Ha hayap iglahaw gistay.
Dapat is Hisos iglwang has taw, Ho fag mamaadal yapdi has iba fag manga banwanan ka Fiya fag Barita han Diyos sakop baliwa. Maskin nga is Diyos nasogo angko hastay, tonya wa kangko bato ibolonon.
Ginyas Hisos igtoltol yapdi sas manga fanimbaan Hodyo sas sakop Hodiya.
Aban, kawa manga taw kaaywanon kasayag talinga in Diyos hampang, ta tifonan tifonan ya san Hisos akbang. Is Hisos malindogan sas akbang linaw Ginisarit.
Ginyas Hisos nalag dowak baloto sas bahalan linaw. Ka mangag fon baloto, manga fangoyang fag manga taw, indokson wan git manga basad baloto, gogas wat manga sarap.

Yakangas Hisos nasakbaw has basad baloto sadi a, nalwang han Simon, kagfon tonya fag baloto, No fiya di, ha faosonan yap ogbot gis bahalan im baloto. Ginya madis Hisos matokawan sas basad baloto a, igfaadal ka manga taw sas baba bintalan.
Araw, is Hisos nontabo wagfaadal has manga taw, nalwang han Simon, Ham fag hawas fagbokngan linaw. Ham fadagdagan hayo manga sarap ha basad linaw kaarakitay omiktan oyang.
Is Simon nasagot kitay, Haw kagfaadal, sadi wak yabi hanggan wa kayawa midwa ha naiktan, minyaya wan. Dapat kawa haw nalwang fag fadagdag ka manga sarap, ho fadagdag ngay.
Ginya ta nafaanod odi ngay, ta nafadagdag it manga sarap. Nyawa kitonya, kaaywanon wa fag manga oyang ista iktan araw, madala wamragyang kasta manga sarap it kaaywanan it iktan.
Yakanga ta nafaaman ha sadik baloto kaarakitay igfatogbong it manga ofod. Ginya ka sadik baloto nagobok wan da Simon. Ta nafahapno wa oyang fagayo dowak baloto, madala wamlogom ha daga danom.
Is Simon Pidro no nalag kitay aywan it iktan, nanlibabaan san Hisos atobangan a, nalwang, Angko Fon, ha fag ayayo yap gingko, maskin dwat angko manga ogali.
Is Pidro hanggan it manga ofod indolaw wan kawat iktan oyang kaaywanan wan.

Hanggan in Simon manga ofod sa sadik baloto, da Santyago da Hwan, in Sibidiyo manga anak, tandolaw yadi wan. Ginyas Hisos iglwang han Simon, Haw fag idwa kadala, gis kati ginan taw man kam iktanon aban.
Ginya madi kasta manga baloto nondagsa wan, da Pidro naobon wat manga akwa fagayo a, natahin wan Hisos.

Ginya madis Hisos no sawa sadik banwa, ha sadik ama ha sagit kitong, nakfos wa sadik habilogan, naakbang han Hisos. Ka ha kitong no nalag in Hisos, nanlibabaan a, nafaaronganon hanya, iglwang, Ama, haw no kasaya di, haw fadi wad somyagan igfafiya angko sagit.
Ginyas Hisos natawid hanya, iglwang, Ho kasaya ngay, haw fag imfiya wan. Ginya madit kitong dagos wanfiya.

Yakangas Hisos natogon hanya kitay, Hawag fwayong nyawa hada fag manga taw, dapat fag ha yap has fagalan-han-Diyos, fabantayan hanya im habilogan. Ginya madi ha disagan kan Mwisis natogon bato disagon bilang faorongan has taw kitay haw infiya wan.
Yatokitay, indahit di ngap has manga taw kawan Hisos naibolon. Yakanga ka fakaaywanan fag manga taw inbarangkadan di ngap han Hisos kaarakitay tomalinga hanya, hanggan igfafiya ista manga sagit.
Dapat ay, is Hisos hawas ayayo gista manga banwanan kaarakitay mandarangin sinya.

Dapat gis nanya fag kasohodan is Hisos nogfaadal, ha akwa manga Farisiyo hanggan ka mangag faadal in Mwisis manga togon gis fagayo fag banwa, sakop Galiliya hanggan sakop Hodiya hanggan gis Hirosalim, ta matokawan yadi sinya. In Diyos kadonongan sawan Hisos kaarakitay igfafiya ka manga ha sagit.

Yabay, gis nanya ha manga taw kadasog, gosong sat baba sagmak, sadik taw kadwa syagan kimot. No kitay di, tagpilit wagfasakbaw nangos hanya has basad balay kaarakitay ta fomwalid ka ha sagit han Hisos akbang.
Dapat ay, tadwa twag fasakbaw hanya, kawa sawas fakaaywanan fag manga taw, yakanga ta hawas baba balay. Ta nalosbong ka atop a, natonton han Hisos akbang, ka ha sagit sat baba sagmak.
Is Hisos no nalag kitay tagsyag marigon ha hanya, nafwayong has ama kadwa syagan kimot, Ama, hogfaliyam im manga naogali dwat.
Ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo hanggan ka manga Farisiyo nangarisipan kitay, Fakta tonya ka kampang igsway in Diyos? Bohonwa awkin is Diyos lamang ka ha kangayanan igfaliyam manga ogali dwat?
Dapat is Hisos nasarom ista fagisipon, yakanga nalwang has taw kiti, Kana mayon ham no nangarisipan kitonya?
Sida ka malpos fwayongon, ngatay, Im manga naogali dwat fag imliyam wan, ngatay Ha fag kabangon, haw fag lomahaw wan?

Dapat ho falag ha hayo kitay, aho Kanbali Taw, ha kangayanan igfaliyam ista manga ogali dwat istay sas baba daga. Ginyas Hisos nafwayong has idwa syagan kimot Aho wa kaglwang kitay, Haw fag kabangon wan, diyan wam sagmak, nyawa ha mwali wa kati.
Ka ama dagos wa nalindog sas faglagan manga taw, naanggong wat sagmak, nwali wa a, igfasayagdog ya ngadi han Diyos.
Ka manga taw indolaw wa dahol iglag, ta nataka wan, nafasaya ya ngadig dog in Diyos, taglwang, Madolaw wa dahol dahol kantam lagan kati.
Ginya madi araw, is Hisos nadokson wan gis basad balay, inlahaw wan, nalag sadik ama kagsohot bohis Roma, it ngayan is Libi, matokawan sas fanohotan bohis. Is Hisos iglwang hanya, Ha tahinan wangko.
Is Libi dagos wanlindog, naobon wat manga sangkap fagayo fagayo a, natahin wa hanya.
Ginya madis Libi nasyahod it manga fanganon aywan sat balay kawas Hisos nondasog. Manga fanohot bohis Roma aywan, hanggan ka iba taw sinya yadi igsayowan kwan handa Hisos.

Ka manga Farisiyo hanggan kat manga ofod kagfaadal Batasan Hodyo, gidginasan wa gidginasan wan. Taglwang han Hisos manga katogbong, Kana ham no kwan, manga ginom, igsayowan has manga fanohot bohis hanggan has manga taw ka ha ogali dwat?
Is Hisos nasagot has taw, Ka manga ha sagit ka kasaya has famolongan, no kadidwa ha manga sagit idwa kasaya hanya.
Maskin honbangkad hastay, kangko fagsayahon, bohonwa ka gayfan kitay it manga ogali fiya, dapat ka manga taw ka ha ogali dwat kangko fagsayahon kaarakitay ta somoyo wan.

Ginya tibag lwang han Hisos kitay, In Hwan manga katogbong fagabadwa kwan hanon kaarakitay mandarangin mahogod. Kitonya yadi ka manga Farisiyo katogbong ogali. Bati im manga katogbong kwan di hanon fagaba, hanggan ginom.
Is Hisos nasagot is taw, Ham awkin idwag fahwan hanon hasagfasakop hasta fangsawan fatalagaan fanganon, kagbabay no gofod yapdis taw?
Dapat ay, aban, ha gomamat tomaban kagbabay, gis nanya ta bago didwa kwan hanon kaarakitay mandarangin mahogod.
Ginyas Hisos nafahalimbawa yadi kitay, Idwa ha romagyang rotay bago, falonob has daanon. No omibolon kitonya imdwat wa ka rotay bago, hanggan ka lonob bago idwa yadi maangay has rotay daanon.
Idwa yadi ha taw somiblag alak bago has basad sohadan anit daanon. No omibolon kitonya ka sohadan anit imbosni wan, ka alak im-od-olanan lamang, ka sohadan anit imdwat yadi wan.
Yatokitay, tagsiblag bago fag alak has bago fag sohadan anit.
Nyawa faktaw no gayfan yapdi kitay ka gona fag alak ka fiya kainom, idya kasaya manginom ka bago, maskin iglwang ka gona fag alak fiya wan.
Sadi ginan, sas Sirang Kafahowayan, da Hisos igdalan sasta namay ha tirigo. In Hisos manga katogbong nabol manga haway tirigo sayok, ginya no naligis basad dalohap, ta nahwan wan.
Tibak Farisiyo nangabaya has taw, taglwang, Kana ham no gibolon kadwa maangay sas Batasan Hodyo maskin sawas Sirang Kafahowayan?
Is Hisos nasagot has taw, nalwang, Ham awkin idwa nabasa in Dabid naibolon hyabi no kalonos, hanggan wat manga ofod kalonos yadi?

Is Dabid nasakbaw han Diyos basad balay a, nabol ka tinapay kandisag han Diyos, ginya madi nahwan wan. Is Dabid nadisag ya ngadi hat manga ofod. Ka Batasan Hodyo iglwang kitay ka manga fagalan-han-Diyos lamang ka fiya homwan tonya fag tinapay.
Ginyas Hisos nalwang yadi kitay, Aho, Kanbali Taw, kagbahala has Sirang Kafahowayan.
Ginya, aban sa sadi yak Sirang Kafahowayan, is Hisos igsakbaw ya has basad fanimbaan a, igfaadal has taw. Sinya ha sadik ama it gamat balis sihon inrifis wan.
Ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo hanggan ka manga Farisiyo igbantay ya ngay in Hisos, ngatay fafiya ya nga araw sas basad Sirang Kafahowayan, maskin tagsayak it fabangdanan hanya.
Dapat is Hisos fadi wad twa ista manga fagisipon, yakanga hanya nafwayong has ama kanrifis it gamat, Ha fag hastay is fagonan. Ka ama naakbang han Hisos, nalindog ya ngadi sasta fagonan.

Is Hisos nafwayong has fakaaywanan kiti, Ho mangintaw hayo, sida ka maangay has Batasan Hodyo, ham gayfan, ngatay ka gibolon fiya, ngatay ka gibolon dwat sas Sirang Kafahowayan? Ngatay igbawi taw, ngatay igfahatay?
Is Hisos namarantayon yapdi has taw sat ligongan, bago di nahampang has ama kanrifis it gamat, nalwang, Falogdayan yap im gamat. Ka ama nafalogday ngat gamat, infiya wa dagos, ogali wan.
Ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo hanggan manga Farisiyo it mata di myasa wa bayong kawa kaisog wa dahol in Hisos. Yakanga tagtoltolan no kana kasta ibolonon hanya aban.
Ginya madi, gis nanya fag masohod, is Hisos hawas moyod kaarakitay mandarangin. Hanya nandarangin han Diyos sadi wak yabi hanggan wa kayawa.
Yakanga, no sirang wan, nafatawag it manga katogbong, ginyas Hisos nafili ka Safolo-ha-Dowa, kat nangayan it manga Fandiya-Barita.
To kat manga nafili, is Simon, kawan Hisos nangayan is Pidro, hanggan is Andris it fadwasay, da Santyago, da Hwan, da Filipi, da Bartolomi,
da Matiyo, da Tomas, in Santyago yadi sangay in Alfiyo anak, ginyan Simon yadi sangay ka goyon marigon it manga kapariho Hodyo,
da Hodas in Santyago anak, hanggan da Hodas Iskariyoti ka naoyon it ofod kalaban.

Is Hisos hanggan it manga ofod haya nga was lwad baliwa, hawas basad datag. In Hisos manga katogbong fagayo sinya yadi wan. Kaaywanan wa fag manga taw inbarangkadan wan gis sakop Hodiya hanggan gis banwa Hirosalim, ka yadi gis manga banwa Tiro hanggan banwa Sidon sas bahalan dagat. Ta fagayo nagobok in Hisos kaarakitay tomalinga hanya hanggan igfafiya ista manga sagit.
Is Hisos nafafiya yadi ka ha manga labang igfahoriyan hanya.
Maskin ha karigonan gin Hisos kagfafiya has fagayo, fagayo fag manga taw gwayan wa kasaya ngadi somapkid, ta fag somapkid wan Hisos.
Is Hisos nabantay hat manga katogbong a, nalwang, Nyawa ham manga myabog, ham bomaya wan maskin in Diyos sakop hayo wan.
Nyawa ham kalonos kati, ham bomaya wan maskin ham mapsog aban. Nyawa ham ha karongkotan kati, ham bomaya wan, maskin ham ha kasolongan aban.
Manga taw no kadwat iglag hayo, kawa ham galwasi angko, Kanbali Taw, ta nogsogo hayo, ta nogyod hayo, nyawa taglingo wa hayo manga ngayan, ham bomaya wan.

Nyawa hamlag kitonya, ham fag masolong wa dahol dahol, fag lokso ya ngadi, maskin dahol aban hayo tanggapon fasalamat san Diyos banwanan sam tongod. Ista manga hafofowan magorang naibolon yadi kitonya han Diyos manga fangampang hyabi.
Dapat ay, isyay wan, ka hayo lagon aban, ham ka manga maakwa, maskin ham nadog wa hayo kafiyan kati.
Isyay wa ka ham ka fagaba wa mahapsogan kati, Aban ham imlonos wan. Isyay wan aban, ka ham, ka fagaba wa mahasayan, Aban ham imhori wan, mangodgorawan ya ngadi.
Isyay wan no aba fagayo fag manga taw igfasayagdog hayo, maskin ista manga hafofowan magorang igfasayagdog yadi kitonya has manga bohagon fag fangampang hyabi.
Dapat, ham ka mangag talinga angko, hogfwayong ha hayo kitay, ham fakaawa hayo manga kaaway. Ham fag fiya has manga taw ka kadwat iglag hayo.
Ham fag kampang mahoway has mangag fadwat igdog hayo. Ham fag darangin yadi kawa has mangag fahoriyan hayo.
No hagtofa hayo marigon sas faringfing, fag kaman balis baliw. Ta nogbol hayo balokas ka aba-aba, disagan yadi wa ka agod kat famabasad.
Ham disagan has fagayo kagsagad gi hayo, no nabol hayo manga botang, ham hawag bawi.
Fag maangay hayo manga ogali has taw, no kinday hayo fakasayaon nangos taw no gogali ha hayo, ham fag kitonya yadi has taw.
Ham idwa fiya man has taw hayo ogali, no ka lamang kaawa hayo ka hayo fakaawaon. Nyawa ka ha manga ogali dwat fadi wad twa kaawa ka manga kaawa has taw.
Ham idwa fiya man has taw hayo ogali no ka lamang syagan igtogbong hayo ka hayo fagtogbongon. Nyawa ka ha manga ogali dwat fadi wad tomogbong has syagan igtogbong hanya.
Ham idwa fiya man has taw hayo ogali no hayo fagfaoyamon ka lamang syagan igbayad. Nyawa ka ha manga ogali dwat igfaodoyaman ha sadi ha sadi, ta no twa di kitay bomayad di aban.

Yatokitay, ham ngap fag kaawa hayo manga kaaway, fag falag has fiya. Ham fag faoyam has taw nyawa ham idwa ha faglagon ista bato bayadon. Hayo ogali no kitonya, dahol hayo tanggapon fasalamat aban, hanggan ham imbali in Diyos manga anak. Is Diyos, ka abwat man has fagayo fagayo it kangayanan, fiya it ogali has manga taw kadyapdig baya hanya, has mangag sadili odi.
Ham fag maawaon kito yadi hayo Ama.

Ham fag idwa gato fagaba hayo kapariho, ginya madis Diyos idwa yadi gato hayo. Ham fag idwag fatohoyan hayo manga iba has fadosaan, ginya madis Diyos idwa yadi fatohoyan hayo has fadosaan. Ham fag idwa ha bodbotangan ha sadi ha sadi, ginyas Diyos idwa yadig botang hayo manga ogali dwat.

Ham fag madisagon has taw, ginyas Diyos domisag yadi ha hayo napno wa gantangan, maaligigan ya ngadi, hanggan wa nafaambobong wan. Maskin no kinday hayo gantangan has taw, kitonya yadis Diyos no gomantang ha hayo.
Ginya madis Hisos nafalimbay ya ngay has manga bota baliwa, naintaw, Sadik bota syagan awkin gomamat ka sadik bota, ham gayfan? No kitonya ta pariho imdagdag has gobang, idwa aw?
Idwa ha katogbong ka madonong man kagfaadal hanya, dapat kagfaadal no nafwayong wa fiya fiya, ka katogbong imlobos yadi kito kagfaadal hanya.
Kana mayon haw nogbantay ka dihot sam fadwasay basad mata, dapat hagfabayaan ka sa hyamo sadili mata, bilang wa dahos batang?

Kinda araw haw no lomwang ha hyamo fadwasay, Ho nangos bomol ka dihot gi hyamo mata, dapat hadyag lag kitay ka sa hyamo mata, manghara, daho was batang. Hagfataka odi, gwadi bol yap ka daho was batang ka sa hyamo sadili mata, ha bago di lomag fiya fiya, ginya madi ha tomwa bomol ka dihot gim fadwasay mata.
Idwa ha fiya fag fon hayo kagbohad dwat. Idwa yadi ha dwat fag fon hayo kagbohad fiya.
Ka bohad kagfalag no kana fag hayo it fon. Tam idwag bol bohad igos gis fon madogi, idwa yadig fangta manga bohad obas gis hayahaya.

Ka taw no fiya it ogali, it fwayong fagaba yadi wa fiya, maskin it fagayfanon fagaba wa fiya. Dapat ka taw no dwat it ogali, it fwayong fagaba yadi wa dwat, maskin it fagayfanon fagaba wa dwat. No kindawasta fangayofan, kitonya yadi ka kadog.
Kana mayon ham no fagabag ngayan angko, Hayo wa Fon, dapat ham idwa katanog angko manga fwayong?
Ho homalimbawa hayo kawa has fagayo fag manga taw ka omakbang hangko, igtalinga angko manga hampang, hanggan katanog yadi.

Hanya kito wa sadik taw ka nahodkod abasad hanggan wa nadasog bato, bago di natorok it balay. Ginya madi, no nabaha, ka danom fadi wad nadalan hanya fag balay, dapat idwan hawig maskin abasad it hodkod.

Dapat ay, kagtalinga angko manga hampang, dapat idwa katanog, kito sadik taw nahalig balay idwa abasad it hodkod. Ginya madi no nabaha, ka danom no nadalan hanya fag balay, dagos wa nakfo, insarowayan lamang.
Ginyas Hisos nontabo wagfaadal tonya fagayo hasta fagdogan, hawas basad banwa Kapirnaom.
Yabay, sinya ha sadik fagtahinan sondalo taga Roma, mahoway wa dahol hat nasali sogowan ka ha sagit, kaakbang wa kahatay.
Ka sondalo fagtahinan no nadog kawa han Hisos, nasogo manga fagtahinan Hodyo tiba, kaarakitay fomwayong han Hisos, Fag hayap ista balay fagtahinan sondalo, fafiyaan nangos it nasali sogowan.
Ka manga Hodyo no nalag in Hisos, tagfahowayon wa no kampang, iglwang, To fag fagtahinan sondalo fiya wa fagtogbongon,
kawa hanya kaawa wa dahol intam layonan taw, manga Hodyo. Hanya yadi ka nafahalig intam fanimbaan sas Kapirnaom.

Ginyas Hisos naofod is taw. Ta no kaakbang wa bangan has fagtahinan sondalo balay, ka fagtahinan sondalo nasogo it manga fakilalaon kaarakitay tomagbo in Hisos, iglwang, Ham fag fwayong kiti han Hisos, Ama, hawag fayaya ngap hyamo, ho kaya wa hyamo, nyawa hadwam dasog hangko balay.
Aho idwa fiya hampangon ha hyamo, yakanga hodwa has nyamo. Ka fiya, haw fag lomwang yap man kitay, Ka sondalo sogowan fag imfiya wan, ginya hanya fag imfiya ngay.

Kawa aho sadi yadik taw kagfasakop has manga abwat fag kangayanan, dapat ay, aho ha fagsogoon yadi manga sondalo. Aho noglwang ha sadi, Ha fag hanya wan, yakanga hanyan tanog wan. Aho noglwang ha sadi ya, Haw fag hastay, hanyam bangkad wan. Aho noglwang hangko nasali sogowan, Haw fag gibolon kito, hanya omibolon wa tonya.

Yakangas Hisos no nadog it hampang, indolaw wan, nasayango has fakaaywanan fag manga taw ka goyan hanya, ginyag lwang, Hogfadog ha hayo, hodya ha donggon no kitay iba taw kitonya wa kagsyag angko marigon, nyawa sawan Israil manga hasokfonan.
Ka fagtahinan sondalo manga nasogo haraw, no nwali hasta balay, ta nalag kitay kat nasali sogowan infiya wa yabay.
Ngalay di aban is Hisos haya sadik banwa, banwa Nain. It manga katogbong naofod hanya hanggang ka fakaaywanan fag manga taw natahin yadi.

Da Hisos no kaakbang wan has sakbawan alad banwa, ta natoon nahablang ka manga manlobgob sadik ama ka natay. Kat ina danwa balo, hanggan to kasta faglobgobon, it anak ama sadi sadi. Kaaywanon ka gofod hat ina, ka manlobgob.
Kagfon intam no nalag ka ina balo, in-awa hanya, iglwang has ina, Haw fag idwa goraw.
Is Hisos naakbang a, natawid ka fwalidan natay, yakanga kagdiya intorosan yadi. Is Hisos nahampang has natay, nalwang, Bago ama, hoglwang ha hyamo, haw fag kabangon wan.
Ka natay haraw, intokaw ya, dagos wa nahampang. Is Hisos nafaano ya hat ina it anak bago ama.
Ka manga taw indala wa dahol dahol iglag, dapat igfasayagdog yapdi han Diyos, taglwang, In Diyos fangampang sadi, madonong wa dahol, inbangkad hantam. Is Diyos in-awa waglag it sakop.
To kan Hisos naibolon indog wa has fagayo sas sakop Hodiya hanggan sadi wak dahonya banwanan sas ligongan.
Is Hwan kagfatogna manga taw, it manga katogbong nabarita hanya to fagayo kan Hisos naibolon.
Ginyas Hwan nafili it katogbong dowa, nasogo hasagfon intam kaarakitay omintaw, Haw awkin kawan Diyos natogon kitay imbangkad hastay, ngatay mi ha fagfanayaon yapdi sadi ya.

In Hwan katogbong dowa, nondasog han Hisos, nalwang, Is Hwan kagfatogna manga taw itfagonan, nasogo hyami hastay kaarakitay mi omintaw hyamo ngatay haw awkin kan Diyos natogon kitay imbangkad hastay, ngatay mi ha fagfanayaon yapdi sadi ya?
Gis nanya yadi fag manga masohod, in Hisos nafafiya kaaywanon, ka manga inhori it sagit, hanggan ka ha manga labang kagfahoriyan hanya. Nafafoga ya aywan ka manga bota.

Ginya madis Hisos nafwayong has taw, Ham fag goli ya ngawan han Hwan, ham fwayongan ka hayo lagan hanggan donggon. Fag fwayong kitay, ka manga bota infoga ya ngat mata, ka manga infihong it bitis iglahaw ya, ka manga ha kitong infiya yadi wan, hanggan ka manga bongkok igdog ya, ka manga natay inboyag ya, hanggan ka Fiya fag Barita nafaadal has manga myabog yadi.
Ka taw kadwa gadowan igsyag angko bomaya wan.

In Hwan manga sogowan nonlahaw wan, is Hisos nafwayong has manga taw kawa han Hwan, iglwang, Kana mayon hyabi, ham no hawas basad fakahyabogan? Kana ka hayo fagasolopon sinya? Ham awkin kasayag lag ka bagyo nogfarayfayan igfarayfayan ka iyano?
Kana ham no hanya? Ngatay hayo fagasolopon sinya sadik taw myasa wa fiya it manga solong rotay? Gwadi sawas gorangon balay ka myasa wa fiya it solong rotay, kawa maakwa wa dahol, idwa ha korang.
Kana orongan ka hayo fagasolopon sinya? Ngatay in Diyos fangampang sadi? Ala ngay, tonya wan, hanggan hogfwayong ha hayo, ka hayo lagan sinya it kangayanan bohondi kito kan Diyos manga fangampang.
Maskin is Hwan kat faglwangon sas Kasoratan noglwang kitay, Fanlag ngay, hogsogo angko sogowan ka gomona hyamo. Hanya mamatalaga hyamo bato lahawan.
Hogfwayong ha hayo idya ha anak kansagaya git ina ka abwat man in Hwan it kangayanan, is Hwan kagfatogna manga taw. Dapat, ka ogbot man has fagayo san Diyos sakop it kangayanan, abwat man in Hwan.
Ka manga fanohot bohis Roma inaktom has manga taga sinya fag manga taw igfasayagdog in Diyos no nadog in Hisos fwayong. Tonya fag manga taw kan Hwan nafatogna itfagonan.
Dapat ka manga Farisiyo hanggan ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo igdayo di in Diyos fasadan has taw, idwa yadi han Hwan kaarakitay igfatogna.
Is Hisos nalwang has taw, Kinda odi kin angko fatoladan ka kati fag manga taw, ham gayfan?
Kito odis manga anak matokawan sas famahowayan, igtawag hat manga ofod anak, iglwang, Mi fadi wad nafaoni palawta, dapat ham kafang digtayok. Nyawa hami nangodgorawan, ham kafang yadi goraw.
Kawas Hwan, kagfatogna manga taw nonbangkad hyabi, nomtoon idwa kwan hanon kaarakitay mandarangin mahogod, idwa yadi ginom alak. Yakanga ham iglwang kitay Labang wa kagfon hanya.

Ginya madi, aho man, Kanbali Taw, inbangkad hastay, kwan yadi hanon hanggan ginom kitos iba taw, ginya ham iglwang, Yabay, to fag taw mahogod wa kwan a, iglango ya ngadi, koyog yadi has manga fanohot bohis Roma, hanggan has tiba taw ka ha dwat fag manga ogali.
Nyawa ham iglwang kitonya, in Diyos manga anak ogali kagfatohoyan kitay in Diyos kadonongan myasa wa fiya.
Ginya madi aban, sadik Farisiyo nataban in Hisos hat balay kaarakitay manayowan kwan. Is Hisos hawas balay Farisiyo a, masorayan dayo fanganan.

Sinya fag banwa ha sadik ina, manga taw twa wa kitay dwat wa dahol it ogali. Tonya fag ina nadog kitay is Hisos kwan sas balay Farisiyo, yakanga ka ina nadiya sadik sohadan, alabastoro fag bato, napno famabanglo.

Ka ina naakbang han Hisos dayo goyoy hat akbang bitis. Ka ina goraw a, dagos wagfayamos wan in Hisos bitis it lowa, ginya madi it famyad it bok wan, naayok ya ngadi in Hisos bitis, ginya nalidgid ya ngadi famabanglo.

Ka Farisiyo kagtaban in Hisos hat balay, no nalag ka ina ibolon, it fangayofan iglwang, To fag ama non Diyos wa fangampang orongan, hanya fadi wad twa no faktaw, hanggan no kindat ogali ka ina kagsapkid hanya, gwadi dwat wa dahol it ogali.
Is Hisos nasagot in Simon fagayfanon, nalwang, Simon, aho ha fagfwayongon hyamo. Is Simon iglwang, Haw kagfaadal, kana ara tonya?
Is Hisos igtoltol kiti, Ha dowak taw ha bayadan ha sadik taw. Ka sadi kat bayadan limak daan dinaryo, insadi lima dik safolok dinaryo.
Ta nodwa nasyagan nabayad, ka nafaoyam idwa yadi nasohot ka fagayo dowa. Da fag taw gis dowak taw ka ha bayadan kwarta ka bohondi kito ka sadi nogbaya ka nafaoyam?
Is Simon nasagot, Angko fangayofan kagbaya wa dahol hanya, ka dahol it halga kat bayadon. Is Hisos nalwang, Anod, tonya wa ngay.

Ginyas Hisos igbantay has ina a, dapat iglwang han Simon, Ha awkin iglag to fag ina? Gwadi aho nonsakbaw ha hyamo balay, hadwa nadisag angko danom fanggonaw angko bitis, dapat to fag ina nafayamos it lowa angko bitis, it famyad it bok ya ngadi.
Hadwa yadi naayok angko, dapat aho indasog di ngay, idwa nafagomon naayok angko bitis.
Hadwa yadi nalidgid langis olibo angko alfoyo, dapat hanya nalidgid famabanglo angko bitis.

Yakanga hogfwayong ha hyamo, maskin hanya galwasi wa dahol angko, kalag wa kitay fagayo it manga naogali dwat kaaywanon, inliyam wan. Dapat ay, no sayok ista naogali dwat kanliyam, idwa bangan igfalag kitay hanya galwasi angko.
Ginyas Hisos nafwayong has ina, Im manga naogali dwat fagayo inliyam wan.
Ginya madi ka mangag sayo in Hisos, it manga fangayofan iglwang, Kana mayon to fag ama nogfaliyam ista manga naogali dwat, fakta kin nangos tonya?
Dapat is Hisos nalwang has ina, Maskin haw igsyag hangko haw inbawi wan, nyawa ha mwali wan kati, im fangayofan inhoway wan.

Ginya madi, idya dogay aban, is Hisos nanabang has iba banwanan a, nasafong wan ka manga banwa hanggan ka manga forowan balay sas dayo banwa. Natoltol hanggan nafaadal ka Fiya fag Barita kawa han Diyos sakop baliwa. Ka Safolo-ha-Dowa nahin yadi wan Hisos.
Ha manga ofod yadi ina kan Hisos nafafiya it sagit hanggan nafalagyo ka manga labang. To fag manga ina kawa da Mariya taga Magdala, fitok labang kan Hisos nafalagyo ginya fag ina,

hanggan da Hwana, in Kosa babay. Is Kosa in Gorangon Hirodis katogbong. Da Sosana hanggan aywan yapdi ka tiba ina. To fag manga ina natogbong in Hisos hanggan hat manga katogbong kawa gista sadili manga kaakwaan.
Ginya madi, gi sadik banwa, gi sadik banwa, manga taw kabarangkadan wan, gakbang han Hisos. Ginyas Hisos natoltol to fag halimbawa,
Sadik ama fangiyab hawat namay kaarakitay mamamgas. Hanya nogfamgas, igsabod odit binhi, yakanga tibak botol indagdag has boknga dalan a, ta nalid lamang, yakanga ka manga manok nahwan wa tonya.
Ha akwa yadi manga botol indagdag has daga libabaw, baba odi dalifi. Tonya natobo ongay, dapat inlayong ya, maskin ka daga kamaya madali.
Ha manga botol yadi indagdag ha sayo manga lamnon madogi. Ka manga lamnon inlangba, nasakfaw di ka manga tanom.
Dapat ay, ha akwan dagdag has fiya fag daga a, natobo, nabohad, fagayo fag bolhog myasa sadik daan no nabohad. Ginyas Hisos nafwayong marigon, Ham no ha manga talinga ya ngadi, fag talinga wan.
In Hisos manga katogbong naintaw in Hisos no kanat kahologan it natoltol halimbawa.

Is Hisos nasagot, Indisag wa ha hayo kitay ham fag tomwa ka mangadyag fadogon kawa han Diyos sakop baliwa, dapat ka tiba, kawa gis manga halimbawa ta no domog kaarakitay, Nyawa ta bomantay, tadwa twaglag, Nyawa tagtalinga, tadwa yadi twagdog.
Is Hisos igfadagos yapdit hampang, nalwang, Kito kat kahologan ka halimbawa. Ka binhi in Diyos wa hampang.
Ka botol kandagdag has boknga dalan kawa ka mangag talinga, dapat is Fandaya indasog igfaliyam gista basad fangayofan kan Diyos hampang kaarakitay tadwa katiwala in Diyos, idwa yadim bawi.

Ka mangan dagdag sas daga libabaw baba dalifi, kagtalinga in Diyos hampang a, igtanggap wa ongay, masolong wan, no kitay di, dapat idwag dalid abasad sat fangayofan. Sadik ngalay intiwala wan, dapat no hagsolay is taw, tagdayo wa dagos.

Kandagdag ha sayo manga lamnon madogi, igfahalimbawa ka mangag talinga ongay, dapat ay, kat manga fagisipon fagaba hat manga kakorangan, ngatay has kaakwaan, ngatay has kasolongan baliwa, igsakfaw di in Diyos hampang, yakanga idwag bohad sasta basad fangayofan.

Dapat ay, kansabod sas fiya fag daga, kawa mangag talinga han Diyos hampang, gano tonya fiya fiya sasta basad fangayofan, matanogon hanggan malinay. Ta gagwanta yadi, yakangan Diyos hampang igbohad sat manga ogali.
Tam idwag santik salong ginyag fwalid sas daga polahan, ngatay sas daga igyanan. Yatokitay tam igsalifit ka salong sas salangan kaarakitay nyawa faktaw kagsakbaw lomag mayawa.
Idwa ha matagowan kadwam lag aban, idwa yadi ha mafyaloman kadwam dog, hanggan imdiya has faglagan aban.
Maskin ngay, ham fag matagahan no kinday ham nogtalinga. No ka ha akwa, ha tanggapon ya domwag, dapat kadwa ha akwa, nyawa hanya gayfan ha akwa wa ogbot, imbol di tonya aban.
Ginyan Hisos ina hanggan it manga fadwasay inbangkad han Hisos, dapat tadwa syagan gakbang hanya kawa aywan wa dahol fag manga taw.
Ka manga taw iglwang han Hisos, Im ina hanggan im manga fadwasay sawas sokayan kasaya hono lomag hyamo.
Dapat is Hisos igsagot has taw, Ka mangag talinga in Diyos hampang hanggan katanog, tonya wa kangko ina hanggan angko manga fadwasay.
Ginya madi aban, is Hisos hanggan it manga katogbong, nasahay has basad baloto. Is Hisos iglwang, Tam domifay wa has difay linaw. Yakanga tan-ginan wa ngay.
Ka baloto noglahaw wan, is Hisos intoyog wan. Ginya madi araw nabagyo dahol dahol sas baba linaw. Ka baloto kapno wa danom, yakanga ta ganong wamlogom has daga danom.

In Hisos manga katogbong nafolaw hanya, taglwang, Hyami Fon, hyami Fon, kalibang, tam kalogom wan ha daga danom. Is Hisos infolaw wan, nangabaya ka bagyo hanggan ka taob kagsaribwaan. Ginya madi intohas ya. Yabay inhalyaw ya ka dagat.

Ginyas Hisos iglwang has taw, Kana ham nodwag syag angko? Dapat ay tandolaw waglag a, tandala yadi wa dahol, ta garintawan ha sadi ha sadi kitay, Yabay, faktaw to? Twa oman igfatohas ka bagyo, manga taob, ta katanog wat manga fwayong.
Ginya madi araw tandagsa sas banwanan manga Girasino, sas masohod yadi sakop Galiliya.

Is Hisos indokson di ngay, ha natagbo hanya sadik ama gis banwa, ha manga labang kagfahoriyan hanya. Tonya fag ama dogay wan fawag solong rotay, idwa goli hat balay, sa odi sayo manga lohib fanlobgobanan taw.

Ka ama no nalag in Hisos, narokyaw marigon a, nanlibabaan san Hisos atobangan, iglwang, Hisos, is Diyos, ka Abwat-man-has-fagayo-fagayo, it Anak, kana haw nogmawat angko? Hogfaaronganon hyamo kitay, ha fag idwag fahoriyan angko.

Hanyag lwang kitonya maskin haraw is Hisos nasogo ka labang kitay fag galin wa gis nyamo fag ama. Nogbanwan ka labang mahogod wagfahoriyan ka ama, hanggan nyawa hagbantay di hanya, nyawa tagbinggas, nyawa ta gafos wa manga lobid baol, hanyag bogloy lamang tonya, ginya ka labang igfatabog hanya has basad fakahyabogan.
Ginyas Hisos naintaw hanya, Faktam ngayan? Maskin aywan fag manga labang kagfahoriyan tonya fag ama, hanya nasagot han Hisos, Ahos Mahabanan.
Ka manga labang igfaawaon han Hisos kitay, Haw fag idyag sogo hyami has fakaabasadan.

Gis nanya ha sadik tifonan baboy ayo ayo kwan manga lamnon sas akbang fag moyod. Ka manga labang nafaaronganon in Hisos kitay, Mi fag ha yap man has basad manga baboy nangos, yakanga is Hisos nafaangay wa ngay.
Ginya ka manga labang nalin gis ama, hawas basad manga baboy. Ka tifonan manga baboy dagos nanhadalandanan wa madali has lwad indahodan, has basad linaw dahol, fagayo inlimos wan.
Ka manga gano ista tifonan baboy no nalag ka manga baboy inlimos, ta nalagyo wan, namarita has manga basad banwa hanggan sas ligongan.

Ka manga taw inbarangkadan namantay no kana ka sinya. Ta nondasog han Hisos, taglag ka ama ka ha manga labang haraw. Kati matokawan san Hisos dayo bitis, ha solong rotay a, it fangayofan ogali mandi. Tandala waglag.
Ka manga nalag is Hisos nogfafiya ka ama natoltol has taw no kinda mayon nonfiya ka ama ka manga labang fagfahoriyon haraw.

Ginya madi ka manga taw gis sakop banwanan manga Girasino fagayo nanagad kitay is Hisos fag lahaw gista banwanan kawa tandala wa dahol dahol. Yakanga da Hisos nasahay ya ngawa ha basad baloto a, infwali wan.
